review-text:
Overall great place for a date or special occasion, but food leaves something to be desired.

The atmosphere is quite pleasant. You arrive by boat and enter the restaurant through another restaurant. All the tables and chairs are adorned with nice LED lights, enhancing the ambiance. We ordered one of the set menus. The salad was definitely the highlight of the meal. The soup was pretty good, but the two main courses left something to be desired. The pasta noodles were enjoyable, but the sauce was overly strong, and the shrimp was overcooked. We also had the duck, which had good flavor but was far too dry. The scallop was quite goodâ€”I really enjoyed its texture; it wasnâ€™t soft but had a pleasant chewiness. The steak was decent with good flavor, though it was too chewy. The grits served with the steak were interesting, somewhat like a localized version of grits. The best part of the steak dish was the roasted garlicâ€”it was some of the best Iâ€™ve ever had. Its consistency was perfect, and the flavor wasnâ€™t overpowering; I couldâ€™ve eaten the whole bulb myself. For dessert, we had the cheesecake and molten lava cake. The molten lava cake was just okay and not very moltenâ€”it wouldâ€™ve been much better with vanilla ice cream on the side. The so-called New York-style cheesecake was neither New York-style, nor cheesecake, nor even a cake. It was more like a cookie crumble topped with sweet cream and a layer of pistachios or nuts. The taste was decent, but if youâ€™re expecting cheesecake, itâ€™s nowhere close. It should be renamed to something else. We were also given a call server button to request service, but it didnâ€™t work at all. When we pointed this out, they didnâ€™t bother replacing it.

Great restaurant with a nice atmosphere.
The staff of very professional.
Ask for photos and you get a real Art Director taking amazing photo to remember the night
Highly recommended, we celebrate my GF birthday tonight here and we will come back again
Absolutely love the vibes here! The food is outstanding, and the service is top-notch. ThÃ¡i is an amazing server, and Trung takes the best photos. Canâ€™t wait to come back!
Booked a table for two for our 1 year anniversary. The food was exquisite. Even though the menu was unique, I could tell the chef maintained the taste of Vietnam. Definitely worth the experience.
This place is a gem of Q7.  A romantic place to take your partner to.   Food are really tasty.  Staffs are very friendly.  Will come back soon

We had a very disappointing experience at Mars Venus. Even though we had a table reserved for 5:00 PM, the kitchen didnâ€™t open until 5:30. The dÃ©cor was extremely tacky, the tablecloths were dirty, and the chairs were wobbly and rusty. The food quality was very poor. We ordered steak, but it was cooked terribly â€“ dry on the outside and raw inside. Definitely not medium as requested.
The service was just okay. We were greeted when we arrived, but when leaving, none of the staff said goodbye, even though they were standing at the entrance. Weâ€™re not sure if this was because we gave honest feedback about the food.
Overall, a very bad experience. We cannot understand how this restaurant has so many positive reviews. We will not be coming back.

Best place I ever come. Nice staff, friendly, so sweet place .. seriously service excellence
Foods so delicious and decoration 10/10.
-Highly recommended.

Great atmosphere, average food.

The setting is beautifulâ€”arriving by boat and dining under soft LED lights creates a romantic vibe. The salad and scallop were standouts, but most mains were underwhelming. The duck was dry, the shrimp overcooked, and the cheesecake wasnâ€™t really cheesecake. Service button didnâ€™t work and wasnâ€™t fixed. Nice place for a special occasion, but the food could be better.

I set up a birthday party with my lover. They prepared it so nicely. The food and service are great at a reasonable price. But the way from the park to the restaurant is dark and easy to swipe for a women who wear high heels.
The food and service were great, our server  Quang Trung was very friendly. Only thing Google maps says the wrong pick up location. You need to go to the d7 marina to get a boat here.

1. Look at the reviews all 5 Stars usually comes from some gift!  But here are totally dumbfounded..... Waiters asked for 5 Stars just standing beside you until you did it!!
2. I really wants to tell the truth...the food just under normal, seafood lobster unfresh smell , beer stake dry and over cooked
3. The environment decoration need to be paid extra Reusable templates!

Went to Mars Venus for birthday celebration. Waiters are very friendly and polite, well dedicated service. Delicious food with reasonable prices, amazing atmospheres, definitely return again in next time!

Very attentive service and good quality food. The only reason I dropped a star was because the courses came out rushed so that we were still eating one course when the next course was served. Overall I would recommend.
Good experience with this kind of romantic restaurant. Next time will come again

Good service, decent Western food, romantic and private atmosphere. Awesome and attentive staff despite
unusually crowded night. However, it was quite hot outside. The restaurant should personalize the sign with the name of the guests instead of using the same â€œhappy birthdayâ€ â€œhappy anniversaryâ€ signs for everyone. The restroom was dirty though.

Wow the service is amazing, they even gave a service request button that we didn't even need to use. Had a birthday dinner here, and they set up everything for you by request. Pictures, cakes, and flowers upon booking request. The setting and atmosphere is nice!
Romantic spot. Food was well presented and prepared. Service and atmosphere were highlights of the evening. Better after sunset.
I went here with my date and it was fantastic, the view and food here are so nice, especially the beef with had been cooked well. Delicious! Thank you!

Amazing night with my love here.
Thanks Mr An and Mr Trung who supported us ðŸ’ž

Wow! If you are in district 7 you must go here. What an atmosphere, kind staff, good food and a beautiful place. Very romantic. Remember you must take the boat over, it is free. The restaurant shows on the opposite side of the river on google maps. If you are thinking of proposing to your loved one - this is the place. Also to dine for birthday or anniversary. Tried the signature 4 courses with soft crab and soup, salad with beef, snails and Ribeye. So tasty! The redwine was good as well. They will also give you a small photoshoot if you are interested at the table. Will come back! Thank you all

The food very delicious and the price is good , The general experience here is wonderful. The service is very professional, and the staff is very friendly. Itâ€™s the 2nd I went here and Iâ€™ll come next time again

fantastic place! best restaurant for romantic dinner nights! you will have to take a little boat from the saigon marina to get there but worth it. the food is good, but itâ€™s definitely a place for a couples night. if you want to take cute photos like we did just ask Hao, the waiter will help you! ðŸ¥°

Great atmosphere for your event, the service is flawless and the food was a good experience !

Be sure to check the website to know where to park, a boat will take you the the restaurant location.
should not try, below avrg quality of the basic food's taste about FRESH. Bring 1 mil vnd to another place and try buffet instead plz ! many other options
Great experience with my favorite person ðŸ¥°

Steak didnâ€™t cook right. But they took two wine glass off the bill and brought two pudding dessert as a apology. Good value if you can do some few things well. The snail served is totally different than photo in the menu. Staff came asked if he can take it back and cook some more. So food gone cold by serving in the table, few minutes later cook again makes the snail chewyâ€¦. Kitchen staff should study. Inconsistent wine glass size. ðŸ™€ðŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸Stingy pour. Remember one bottle has five glassesâ€¦ They pour like 1/7. I asked for rib eye steak and later came back and told me they donâ€™t have it. Kitchen should inform staff if something in the menu is not availableâ€¦ also super basic knowledge and communication. Chuck eye mid-rare came as a Rareâ€¦. Chef donâ€™t know how to cook steak. Buy a thermostat for cooking and check the temperature of the meat inside before serving. Itâ€™s super basic, Easy and cheap. Waiter Staff is super nice polite and courteous. Kitchen needs to step up their performance.  Itâ€™s a outdoor restaurant.
The food and service are very well. I will come back next time.

Very romantic & intimate setting. Food was ok, servers were great & professional, they even take photos for you & direct you how to get the best shot. Only way to get there is by boat, which is free & they come every 10 mins or so. Highly recommend for a romantic night with your significant other!
It was a great experience when we are here to celebrate our anniversary. The staffs are very friendly and supportive. The food is good. We are happy with the service.
So great
Great food and amazing service

The staff are super attentive, friendly and hospitable. The food is 8/10, tastes good but just slightly warm when served. We were sitting right at the river bank, so the table is a bit small and narrow but those on the other side look more spacious. Coming here for our  anniversary, they are willing to help us set up the table with candles, bouquet and our lovely polaroids. Will come back, 9/10
Great view, good service . I booked for my anniversary

Amazing!! I did surprise my wife with a romantic dinner in Mars Venus. Services were super nice
â¤ï¸
Fantastic experience and great staff. Highly recommend if you're looking for a romantic spot in D7.

Very slow service. Food was ok but portions were way too small. Me and my wife left hungry after spending over 1,000,000vnd.

Obviously will not be coming back.
The atmosphere is great, the service was awesome.  Would recommend. Would come again
Delicious foods, good service. Romantic place for couple
Trung is an excellent staff. Food is cooked to awesomeness and the atmosphere is warm and great.

Minh Khang speaks great English and he is very helpful. I highly recommend the restaurant especially if you are craving European food. Itâ€™s very classy, and prices are reasonable. The food was amazingâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ðŸ™
This is a perfect place for couples and family on special occasions. The food is good and the service is excellent.
very nice ambience for celebrations. Staff was very nice and friendly. Overall a very good experience ðŸ˜Š

I love the view, very good service and fooods very delicious with flexible price, 10 out of ten point for Venus
Delicious food with great service and gentle atmosphere, recommend for couple â¤ï¸
Great service! Minh Khangsâ€™s treatment was amazing. KOODOS to the chef, the food here is as scrumptious! I highly recommend this place for amazing food and great serviceðŸ™‚ðŸ‘ŒðŸ¾

Food was terrible, not worth the price. Soups and meats and everything else are served almost cold. Feel like they just reheat every dish and bring them to us. Service was poor. For everything, we had to wait. Taking a bill took a long long time as well. Location was bad. Decorations were too much. Won't come back.
Very chill, cozy and romantic vibe. Nice view over the river. The service is the hook: nice, friendly and well trained staff. Definitely would want to come back.

Waiters are super nice and friendly, excellent customer service. They even help to set up the table for pictures.
Food is good enough, reasonable prices.
Had a birthday party here, excellent service, very helpful and friendly. Food is delicious but the wait time may vary. Restaurant is spacious and chill. But boat to get here isnâ€™t whatâ€™s in mind
Great space for dinner, parking at the white restaurant nearby, crossing the pier and going to the right. All the Staffs are very friendly.
Lovely place! Great food and service. Definitely will come back!

Fantastic restaurant for a surprise dinner. The restaurant is on an island that is only accessible by a ferry boat (free) and seems to cater to the romantic birthday and anniversary crowd.

Fix priced menu sets are available, along with cocktails and wine. Although not quite michelin star dining, the food was well plated and tasted amazing. I do wish the birthday cake came last though, and not first.

Service and setup were top tier, having customized birthday decorations, complete with picture frames of you and your significant other, and candles to complement the string lighting around the restaurant.

Overall, would highly recommend for a romantic special occasion or just semi private dining with great ambiance.

Had a birthday celebration here the food was exceptional with a focus on fusion with bold flavours, would recommend the soft shell crab with linguini. Highly recommended to pay a visit for that special evening.

The restaurant is good with the atmosphere, the food and especially with the attitude of the all staff.
The price is acceptable, i did have a good time in here.
This is probably one of the greatest experience I ever been with. Great dining, good service and great experience.
So beautiful. Nice food. Great restaurant !
had my proposal here, very friendly staff, food is good10/10 recommended
Nice place, great service

Outstanding Customer Service
Really Good Food
There's nothing to complain about, highly recommended.

Great food and staff. Would recommend.
Nice views and good services. I have been amazed by boat to the restaurant place and nice views. Will visit again!
Great atmosphere and very nice staffs. Must try. ðŸ˜œ
Good food, kind staff and nice ambience.
The food is great and the service is fantastic!  We also love the atmosphere and the music! We will definitely come back!
very satisfied with the service and the staffs for my proposal eve
Good food with reasonable price. Will definitely comeback again. Thanks for the arrangement of the restaurant. We had a wonderful night.

The food was good, this place is suitable for couple in every date

Very good atmosphere for couple, service is great.
Delicious good!! Thank you very much

Very nice, cool atmosphere.
Above all, all of the dishes were perfect!!

This restaurant has such a wonderfully romantic setting as to not need especially good food, but good food it has in abundance. Portion sizes were perfect for us, though some may feel them small. Prices were reasonable we thought. The soups we had, though not filling by themselves, were delicious and The presentation for all the courses was fantastic. The service is impeccable, whoever trained these servers deserves double whatever their salary currently is.
To get there, you must park (if going by motorbike) in the lot next to the river just past the park, and take their complementary boat to the restaurant. Go to the right when you get off the boat and you'll find yourself in another world.
Good place for private dinner/ couple dinner/ Birthday/ dating
Came here for my birthday dinner. The atmosphere was great and the service was excellent. We had a great time!
Good place with nice service. thank you
delicious dishes, beautiful view with the greatest man ever
Such an amazing restaurant with special location, stunning view, cozy atmosphere, good food & nice staffs ðŸ˜Š
Highly Recommended on dating and family meeting. I got wonderful services, cuisine and fantastic atmopshere and scenary. I do thank you Mar Venus to give us this unique experiences
Highly recommend >v<
A romantic place for couple with nice, friendly staff. And especially, She says: "Yes"
This is really nice and romantic place for couples. The staff is very friendly and the food is so much delicious. This will be a place I will come to for intimate meals in the future
The food was good and the staff are nice. Will probably come back for our next celebration.
Good food, good services. Great music atmosphere
It's quite good for couple on special date. They have a nice photographing service for luxury setup. However the food is not  special for the price.

Highly recommend this restaurant as a place for dating, and celebrating the anniversary, one of the most suitable restaurants for couples.
Keep it up, guys!!!
Good service, nice staff
Good food, good service. Love to coming back ðŸ¥°ðŸ¥°

Good place and pretty decoration

Avoid this place like the plague! Me and my girlfriend requested that on this occasion we just wanted a couple of drinks and to look at the menu for having a meal  at a later date
1st .We were told due to demand (there was approximately 6 people there) My gf decided to  order a main course and French fries.
2nd . She was informed you had to order 2 Main courses!!! I was wondering where the beer we ordered 10 minutes ago was
3rd : This is because it's  a WESTERN restaurant! But nobody could (allegedly speak English

Food is surprisingly good, the setting is romantic, suitable for couples and private event. Itâ€™s just a bit hot though.
An amazing place which my wife and I have just discovered. A ideal place to take your loved ones for dinner. The service is excellent.

Did have my Dad's birthday here in a rainy day during Covid time. Perfect meals and service. My parents love the food and the ambience.
very good

The dÃ©cor was extremely tacky, the tablecloths were dirty, and the chairs were wobbly and rusty. The food quality was very poor. Best place I ever come. Nice staff, friendly, so sweet place .. seriously service excellence

-Highly recommended.

Great atmosphere, average food.

The setting is beautifulâ€”arriving by boat and dining under soft LED lights creates a romantic vibe. The salad and scallop were standouts, but most mains were underwhelming. The duck was dry, the shrimp overcooked, and the cheesecake wasnâ€™t really cheesecake. Service button didnâ€™t work and wasnâ€™t fixed. Nice place for a special occasion, but the food could be better.

We had such a great experience here! â¤ï¸ Nhung was our server and she was absolutely amazing â€” super friendly and attentive. The food was delicious, the music and vibe were perfect, and the service was 10/10. A perfect spot for a date night or just to relax and enjoy a nice dinner.

We came to this restaurant with my boyfriend and received a very warm welcome. The meal was delicious, the atmosphere was pleasant with a pianist playing live music (and it was even possible to request a song), and the restaurant itself is beautiful. We were served by Nguyet, who was exceptional from start to finish. She is very attentive, helpful, and kind. Thank you again for this experience and for the thoughtful touch (the dessert plate) for my birthday.
We truly recommend this place ! :)

Me and my partner are always on the lookout for great dining experience and curated menus when we travel. It is very rare that we will find a restaurant that would have the food on point from start to finish. Normally we will find something that would be average for our tastsâ€¦but NOT CLOUD NINE SAIGON!!!

From the entree to the dessert and the mocktail shots - this restaurant delivered! The food is not the only thing to rave about. The ambience, lighting, and service were all 5-star!

Special thanks to Nguyen for attending to us, and we cannot praise the chef and their team in the kitchen for the outstanding dishes served to us!

Highly recommended and I would not be surprised if they end up in michelin guide in the future.

Beyond My Expectations
Iâ€™ve dined here quite a few times, and I loved it so much that I decided to share my experience at Cloud Nine Restaurant.
I recently celebrated my birthday here.
I booked a decoration package for 1,500,000 VND, along with 8 Star Set menus, each priced at 1,500,000 VND for a 5-course meal, including appetizer, soup, salad, main course, and dessert.
Starting with the welcome experience:
As soon as I arrived, the receptionist kindly guided me to the car parking area right across from the hotel, very convenient for those who drive.
Upon entering the lobby, I was greeted with warm smiles from the staff, very friendly and welcoming.
When the elevator doors opened on the 11th floor, to the left was a stunning poolside area, which is also available for dining, absolutely gorgeous.
My table was beautifully arranged right next to the window, offering a fantastic view of Saigon's iconic buildings like Bitexco Tower and Saigon Centre.
The dishes were skillfully prepared and artistically presented, every course was captivating. The chef even came to the table personally to serve.
I was especially impressed by ThÃ nh, the staff member who took care of our table from start to finish. He was quick, cheerful, charming, and of course, very professional. Iâ€™m sure anyone who dines here will be charmed by him!
The restaurant space is stunning, with private rooms available. I also loved the wine cabinet and the stylish glassware, very classy.
As it was my birthday, the team surprised me with a cake and sang a birthday song. They even had a custom LED sign with my name on it!
To end the evening, ThÃ nh created a magical cocktail called â€œGraciasâ€, it was so impressive that everyone applauded.
Oh, what an enchanting night!
Iâ€™ll be proud to bring my friends here for future celebrations.
Thank you to the amazing Cloud Nine Restaurant team.
Iâ€™ll definitely celebrate my birthday here every year!

Honestly one of the best spots weâ€™ve ever been to. The vibe is fun and chill, the staff are super friendly, funny, and easy to talk to. We felt welcome right away.

The show they put on is wildâ€”in the best way. Cocktails on fire, meat literally getting torched at the table, and the whole thing looked amazing.

They even customized the menu to our crewâ€™s favorite picks, and every single thing tasted great. You can really tell they care about the experience.

Highly recommend if you're looking for good food, good people, and a good time.

My wife organised to celebrate my 30th birthday during our trip to Vietnam and I am so happy she did. One of the best atmospheres and service I have experienced. The food was also very high quality and plated very nice. I will definitely be back for any future celebrations when I come back to Vietnam. Highly recommend Cloud Nine!

An Unforgettable Dining Experience at Cloud Nine Saigon!

From the moment we walked in, Cloud Nine Restaurant delivered an exceptional experience â€” and it was all elevated by our amazing waitress, Nhung. Her attention to detail, warmth, and professionalism made our evening truly unforgettable.

We ordered the grilled salmon with passion fruit sauce, lamb chops with red wine sauce, and an avocado salad with prawn and caviar â€” each dish was absolutely mind-blowing. The ingredients were incredibly fresh, and everything was cooked perfectly to our liking. Nhung took our order flawlessly, described each dish with care, and ensured everything arrived just as we requested.

To top it off, we were surprised with complimentary starters and drinks after our meal, which was such a thoughtful gesture. And the dessert? Spectacular â€” the perfect finish to a phenomenal evening.

This is officially my favorite restaurant in Saigon, and Nhung is hands-down one of the best waitresses I've encountered in all my years in hospitality. We will absolutely be returning. Highly recommended!

I had the pleasure of celebrating my friendâ€™s birthday at Cloud Nine Restaurant, and it was hands down the best lunch Iâ€™ve had in a long time. From the moment we arrived, the vibe was warm and inviting â€” the perfect setting for a special celebration.

Our waitress, Phung Huynh, was absolutely fantastic. She was attentive, friendly, and made sure our meal went smoothly without ever being intrusive. Her recommendations were spot on and really elevated the experience.

As for the food, every dish was a flavor-packed delight. The freshness and presentation showed real care and skill in the kitchen. The [signature dish or your favorite meal] was a true standout â€” perfectly cooked and full of delicious seasoning. Paired with [a drink or side], it turned our lunch into something truly memorable.

All in all, Cloud Nine, combined with Phungâ€™s excellent service and great company, made this birthday lunch unforgettable. I canâ€™t recommend it enough and will definitely be back!

Instagram friendlyâ€¦

The vibe brilliant, a truly great atmosphere with staff who couldnâ€™t do enough for you.

That said all the food was bland and tasteless, no more so than the Korean noodles,

soo much was for show and it felt silly, such as the giant pepper grinder, or using a blow torch and setting fire to a steak at the tables that was cooked in a kitchen just so you can record them doing it.

Honestly we were simply not the demographic for this in anyway, and as such I canâ€™t help but feel sad that we spent more money here than we did in the last week on food combined to feel like we were still hungry at the end of it.

Wow what a place! Beautiful interior, great atmosphere and absolutely delicious food. A great place to bring someone for a special occasion or if you are wanting a romantic/fancy dinner. Shout out to Phung for her exceptional service.

In every way itâ€™s one of the most romantic dining experiences weâ€™ve had anywhere in the world. The view is incredible of course. The staff was attentive to every detail from adding a cute sequined table cloth to delivering a surprise desert delivered with a flaming reveal of a little love note on the plate that Iâ€™d asked them to prepare. The food was amazing especially the Sea Bass with lime leaves and the Waygu Beef Salad. Itâ€™s soo hard to explain how much they went above and beyond in every way. If you have a special occasion or just want to experience old school fine dining this is the spot in Saigon.

We had a team dinner for 25+ pax and everything was perfect! Jayden helped arrange tailored meal sets and even added guest names to the tables. Food was all nice, especially Bak Kut Teh is the must tryyyy for me. Staff were super attentive and sweet, and the live cooking was a great touch. The highlight was the Jazzer with his â€œold and goldâ€ voice and melody, his surprised Vietnamese song made our night unforgettable. Highly recommendedddd

Firstly, I would like to shout out to Ngan and the team for such an excellent service. The food is amazing and overall experience is wonderful. Unforgettable experience! Definitely will come back again. The best restaurant ever!

Great atmosphere. Wonderful and very accommodating staff. We picked it for our anniversary dinner and had so much laughs and good memories. The staff assist you through the whole dining experience. We would come back if we ever travel back to Ho chi minh!

From the very beginning, Mr. Jayden has been nothing short of amazing. Planning a proposal is something you only do once, and I wanted it to be meaningful, smooth, and unforgettable and thanks to him and his incredible team, it truly was!

Jayden went above and beyond. He didnâ€™t just follow instructions; he took the time to understand what I had in mind, and then added his own thoughtful suggestions to elevate everything. From choosing the perfect songs to planning the sequence of events down to the smallest detail, he made sure every moment flowed beautifully. His experience, creativity, and calm presence gave me so much confidence leading up to the big day.

On the actual night, everything was beyond what I imagined. The performance was heartfelt, the food was delicious, and the atmosphere of the restaurant felt so intimate and special, like it was made just for us. There was a quiet magic in the air. My partner and I felt completely immersed in the moment, and looking back, I wouldnâ€™t change a single thing.

This wasnâ€™t just a dinner or a proposal, it was an experience. One that weâ€™ll remember for the rest of our lives!

I want to give my deepest thanks to the entire Cloud Nine Saigon team. Their warmth, attention to detail, and genuine care made us feel like we were the only two people in the world that night. We were truly on cloud nine.

To anyone whoâ€™s thinking of planning a surprise proposal, a celebration, or even just a romantic evening, please donâ€™t hesitate to visit them. Youâ€™ll be in the best hands. This team doesnâ€™t just create events; they create memories.

Thank you again, Mr. Jayden and team, for making one of the most important nights of our lives so perfect!! Weâ€™ll always be grateful!

My colleagues and I spent the week in south Vietnam and decided to have a nice farewell dinner. We chose Cloud Nine and were so glad we did. The food was amazing, some of the best I have ever had. The presentation was equally as wonderful. The service of the staff was an A+ and the view of the city was great. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting HCMC.  Bravo!

It was our first time celebrating our wedding anniversary, and I had requested a special table decoration to mark the occasion. The team went above and beyond, paying close attention to every detail to ensure our evening was both joyful and memorable. The food was delicious, the ambiance was lovely, and the service was simply outstanding.

A heartfelt thank you to Nhung, whose kindness and attentiveness made our celebration even more special. Her thoughtful gestures and warm hospitality truly elevated the experience. Weâ€™re deeply grateful to her and the entire team for creating such a beautiful memory for us. Highly recommended!
Absolutely stunning food and atmosphere! Incredible service from the staff who were attentive and helpful. Exactly what we were looking for for a date night. They even had live piano!

It is one of the best dining experiences! I reserved a very nice table with a nice view.  The food was delicious.  Anhle was my server, and he was very attentive and pleasant.  He loves his job, and it shows. The food presentation is exceptional.  I loved everything from the pepper grinder presentation to the baked Alaska dessert. I would visit again.

The only thing I didn't like was the music selection.  It was too dramatic and opera style. Not appropriatefor the setting. I want to relax and not be rushed,  not hear this bellowing music.  I did mention it because it was too much.  I think they either turned off a speaker or turned it down.  Later, the music selection changed.

Overall,  it was a great experience and delicious.

It is indeed our best decision to book this Cloud Nine Restaurant and dine there. Actually, we are staying at le siesta boutique hotel and we found out there was a fine dining restaurant with exceptionally high rating in reviews.

We were welcomed and served by two very friendly, passonate and knowledgeable servers named Ngan and Sommelier Thanh, we were impressed by the scrumptious food and their authentic presentations, highlighting a burning of rosemary infused aroma to the Aussie tenderloin, the red wine which Thanh recommended best compliment with our food; we also loved the ambience with our favourite romantic songs accompanying the nights nightscape of HCM city. I think the restaurant has done a good recruiting and training of staff. Happy staff brings happy guests. I believed every guest of the night could have the same joyful feeling as me. All in all, we had a memorable dinner tonight.

CÃ¡m Æ¡n Ngan & Thanh !

We were so happy with this wonderful little restaurant- service & food were exceptional. We celebrated my husbands 70th birthday here ( tourists from Australia) The staff were so happy to be involved & helped make our evening really special . Our food was yummy , served with theatrical presentation & delicious . Itâ€™s was a very special evening & we were so happy we chose Cloud Nine - the staff made us all feel special ,especially my husband . A great night we have wonderful memories. Highly recommend this restaurant!!

About dinner time, made a previous reservation on the 11th floor for my birthday eve. Service there were so lovely and waitress Nhung did a fantastic service tonight. The meals and desserts were all so good, highly recommend. So happy to have this perfect night here in the Cloud Nine.

Great place to go if you are looking for a fine dining experience in Saigon. The staff were incredible and attentive, and the ambience was so refined. Food was incredible, and it felt like an experience.

We had a great time at Cloud Nine for our anniversary dinner. My partner booked it and told them that we would have an anniversary dinner. They gave us a surprise complimentary chocolate mousse as in picture. At the end of our time there, they surprised us again with a free mocktail made on our table.

Ngan Ngo and Tran always wanted to ensure that we had the best possible food and experience there.

The ambience was nice and romantic. The service was great. The price is reasonable for the quality of food and services offered there.

We definitely recommend this restaurant!

Excellent experience. Amazing flavours and very well presented food. View was amazing. Staff were very attentive and friendly. Piano player was an excellent touch.  Got complementary cocktail.  Would highly recommend

Went there for a friendâ€™s birthday. We had a booking for 15 people but when we arrived it looked that they were not aware and that was the beginning to a very long evening. They had to set up the tables for us. They were very long to serve the food, we spent 3.5h in the restaurant for a starter and a main each.
When my burata (starter) was served it was still frozen inside, there was plastic on top. My neighbor got his Australian Tenderloin cooked way more than his request. The scallop was a bit fishy and the panned foie gras was served cold.
On a more positive note when a non frozen salad burata arrived it was actually very good and the correctly cooked Tenderloin was good, especially the sauce.
The waiters were very nice and apologized a lot for all the inconveniences.

We had a wonderful experience at Cloud Nine Restaurant Saigon. The staff were warm, attentive, and made us feel very welcome. The food was beautifully presented and full of flavor â€” every dish was thoughtfully prepared. The atmosphere was calm and elegant, perfect for a relaxed evening. Weâ€™d definitely come back the next time weâ€™re in Saigon.

Nguyet was an absolute delight, a wonderful host and amazing energy that made our last evening in Vietnam extra special ..thank you to the chef and bartender for the amazing food and drinks and the divine attention to detail! The whole staff of La Seista hotel are a gem and I recommend anyone visiting Ho Chi Minh to stay here

We were visiting HCMC on my wife's birthday with another couple and Cloud Nine was excellent in terms of service and cuisine.  We had to change our reservation due to a later flight departure from Da Nang but they accommodated  us with no issue.  Our food was excellent in terms of taste and quality and the  presentation is impressive.  To top it off the staff sang Happy Birthday and provided a yummy birthday dessert! I highly recommend giving them a try!
The best duck breast weâ€™ve ever had! The service was even better â€” Nguyet gave us the best service weâ€™ve ever experienced. Weâ€™ll definitely visit again! âœ¨ðŸ‘

Cloud Nine Restaurant was an absolutely amazing experience! The ambiance was elegant and artistic, with wonderful views of Saigonâ€™s skyline that set the perfect mood. The food was exquisiteâ€”each dish was beautifully presented and packed with incredible flavours. The dessert was particularly exquisite. The staff were incredible! Fun, attentive, and ensured all of our needs were met during our dinner. It was truly a fantastic experience from start to finish. Highly recommend for anyone looking to elevate their dining experience in Saigon!

Absolutely outstanding.  This experience along with the food was made special by the incredible staff.

As a foodie, Iâ€™m impressed.
After visiting over 60 countries and hundreds if cities, I can tell you this is a great place to enjoy a dinner.

Thank you for making this all that it was.

Please, improve quality, again....
This time the pre-arranged 4 course menus for 1.5m VND each, were rather disappointing.
The show for 3 of the courses was nice, as always. Service rather good.
However, dining show and service should not be most important but quality of dishes, instead.
None of the courses in both different menus (one more meat, the other more fish) met expectations nor offered the known quality.
After honest and respectful feedback one menu didn't need to be paid, which was fair.
But to leave unsatisfied and hungry is not in expectations....

Quite a wonderful experience. We had a lovely dinner with many pleasant memories to share. 10/10!
The server, Ms. Phung Huynh was attentive and very lovely.

We had an absolutely delightful dining experience at Cloud Nine Restaurant! We opted for the set menu, and each dish was a true delight. The highlight of our evening was the exceptional service from our waitress, Nhung, who was incredibly attentive and made sure we felt well taken care of throughout the meal. The ambiance, combined with the panoramic city views, made for a perfect evening. We rate Cloud Nine a well-deserved 5 out of 5 and highly recommend it!
Amazing food, service is absolutely the best - Nhung and all the staff are very attentive - will definitely come back!

Truly exceptional. Cloud Nine is one of the best restaurants Iâ€™ve ever been to! Great good, great drinks, and top notch service. Anh Le was the best serverâ€” very friendly and accommodating. Had one of the best dinners here and Iâ€™ll definitely dine here again when Iâ€™m back in HCM. Thank you! ðŸ˜Š

Went to try out cloud nine after reading raving reviews.  After stepping out of the elevator, I knew it will be a disappointment.   Restaurant is edged next to a swimming pool.  Musty air with swimmers splashing next to you makes not an elegant atmosphere for a fine dining.  Dining presentation were OK though overly eager to please were obvious.   Most importantly food were bland and lacking basics like dry tenderloin that were supposedly cooked medium rare.   Deserts were plain tasting while pleasing to eyes.
Overall, a big disappointment and added to my regret for wasting a night of dining when we could have sampled fine local dining scene. We will spend next two nights we have on this trip at a fine Vietnamese establishments instead of...

Wow what a fabulous surprise to find a restaurant of this quality equal to any in London Melbourne or Sydney. The service was first class and personal. Anh Le was engaging helpful but not intrusive.
The food was superb.

Had dinner with a group of friends. Left a little disappointed. Service was great as was the atmosphere but the food was passable at best. Had the smoked salmon to start, a Caesar salad, the grilled salmon and the Baked Alaska. The grilled salmon was unfortunately quite dry and not particularly tasty. The rest of the dishes were ok.

We went here for my anniversary meal last week. The food was good for its value. Anh Le was our server for the night and his service was impecable. We also had a 10% discount voucher for the bar above, which had an amazing view. Would definitely come back again next time we visit Sai Gon.

Our group of 50 recently had the privilege of hosting a high-stakes business dinner at Cloud Nine Saigon, and the experience surpassed every possible expectation. From the moment we arrived, the team delivered service of the highest imaginable standard â€” seamlessly blending attentiveness, professionalism, and warmth to create an atmosphere perfectly suited for an important corporate occasion.

The staff handled the size and significance of our event with absolute precision. Every detail â€” from the elegant table settings and flawless coordination to the attentive pacing of courses â€” was executed with effortless grace. No request was too small, and no element was overlooked. The service team anticipated our needs before we even expressed them, ensuring that each guest felt personally cared for despite the scale of the gathering.

The culinary experience was equally exceptional. Each dish was crafted with exquisite attention to both presentation and flavor, leaving a lasting impression on our international guests. The menu struck the perfect balance between local sophistication and global appeal, contributing to an atmosphere of understated luxury that reflected exceptionally well on our organization.

Cloud Nine Saigon did not merely provide a venue â€” they orchestrated an evening that elevated our event into a truly memorable occasion. For anyone seeking to host an important business dinner where impeccable service, refined cuisine, and a flawless setting are non-negotiable, Cloud Nine Saigon stands in a league entirely of its own.

Dining at Cloud 9 was truly a highlight of our trip through Vietnam. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it a wonderful place to unwind. Our waitress, Moon, was exceptionally friendly and attentive, ensuring we felt valued and taken care of throughout our meal. We genuinely appreciated her kindness and the amazing service she provided. Thank you for creating such a memorable evening for us; it was a perfect way to cap off our journey.

We had a fantastic dinner at Nine Cloud Saigon Restaurant to celebrate my girlfriend's birthday. The food was delicious, and the atmosphere was amazing. The restaurant wasn't crowded, likely because we visited on a weekday. The ambiance is romantic and luxurious, making it an ideal spot for a couple's fine dining experience.

Max Vu, the manager, was incredibly helpful. He received the flowers I had delivered earlier in the day and ensured everything went smoothly. He even texted me to ask for my girlfriend's name so they could prepare a personalized banner and put her name on the complimentary cake. He was friendly and provided excellent customer service.

Our server, Ann Tran, was very polite and attentive. She made sure we enjoyed our meal and checked in on us regularly. Ann Tran and Max, along with the rest of the staff, surprised us with a birthday song, a banner, and a chocolate mousse cake, which we greatly appreciated.

This place is truly wonderful, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable dining experience. If you are looking for great service, this is the place to go.
Great food, fairly cheap relative to Australian prices. Service was great and the staff were lovely.
Expensive for a reason. Food is great, staff is extremely hospitable and attentive, and it's on the top floor of the hotel La Siesta. A wholesome experience for a special occasion.

Phung Huynh was our waitress and we appreciate her service, she was very helpful and attend to us with a smile. There are so much varieties of food, option from pho to all style of eggs, all the exotic fruits you could ask for when in vietnam. Will definitely come again.

We visited this restaurant on our first night in the city, and we were immediately impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere, as well as the friendly and attentive staff. While the food is good, I found the prices to be a bit steep, especially considering that theyâ€™re comparable to or even higher than what you'd pay in Europe or Australia. Although the menu offers some solid dishes, it lacks a wide variety of authentic Vietnamese options, with most choices leaning more towards Western-style food. Overall, itâ€™s a nice spot, but it may not offer the best value for those looking for an authentic local experience.
Good stuff, nice environment. Nice playlist and romantic scene, the lights are on point, aesthetically presented food and a bonus Mocktail

Had our 3rd anniversary here. I told them and they organised flowers that I asked. What a great restaurant. Food was fantastic and service was great. Great experience especially for special occasions. Well Done guys.

I recently dined at Cloud Nine Restaurant and was truly impressed. The service was professional and attentive, especially Tuan Anh, who was knowledgeable and welcoming. His recommendations were spot-on, adding a personal touch to the experience.
The ambiance is stunning, with panoramic views of Saigon and elegant dÃ©cor that creates a perfect setting. Each dish was beautifully presented and full of flavorâ€”a true culinary delight.
For a memorable dining experience with top-notch service, Cloud Nine is highly recommended!

Amazing food and really nice atmosphere with good view. Had the 5 course meal with steak that came with some great presentation. The service was amazing, shoutout to Anh Le for taking good care of me and being so attentive. If youâ€™re looking for some good steak I would definitely recommend.

This restaurant is incredible. The staff were so attentive the whole night and made sure we were happy. I had the best steak ever here at cloud nine (you get a nice show as well and it gets cooked in front of you)!!! The atmosphere was romantic which was a bonus as we celebrated our anniversary here! Anh le was an incredible host and waiter all night. He was funny, polite and friendly! He asked if we would like any pepper and brought out a massive pepper grinder haha! To anyone who has him as a waiter is lucky! He made sure our anniversary was perfect and it was! The whole experience and food was a 10/10. My partner and I loved this place so much we will be back!!! Please come here for the amazing food, ambiance and staff. You wonâ€™t be disappointed! Also, they have good vegetarian options!

Wonderful restaurant!
Thanks for all they did to the birthdaystar.
Nice food and wine, especially the sense of ceremony.

My partner and I had the pleasure of dining at Cloud Nine Restaurant, and it was an unforgettable experience. From the moment we walked in, the high-end atmosphere and soothing classical music set the perfect tone for the evening.

We started with the spring rolls, which were fresh and came with two delightful dipping sauces: fish sauce and peanut. For our main courses, we had the chicken roulade and pork short ribs, both of which were cooked to perfection and bursting with rich, savory flavors. The meal was perfectly capped off with the bombe Alaska, a dessert that was as beautiful as it was delicious.

Our evening was made even more special by our server, Tran Pham, who was incredibly attentive and helpful throughout our meal. Her service was nothing short of exceptional, deserving a perfect 10 out of 10.

While you can expect to pay for the premium service and atmosphere, it is worth every penny. The food was divine, the service impeccable, and the overall experience was top-notch. We will definitely be coming back to Cloud Nine Restaurant.

If you are in Ho Chi Mi City you MUST dine here!  Stumbled across this place on our last night in town and I have to say what a way to say goodbye to Vietnam.  This is any foodies dining heaven!!! To top it off the service staff were next level amazing!!! The views were perfect - the whole experience is a 10/10.  This experience is definitely a highlight - put it on your dining experience bucket list!

Cloud Nine offers exceptional food, warm ambiance, and attentive service, making it a must-visit for anyone seeking a delightful dining experience. The staff were incredibly friendly. Thank you, Anh Tran, for your excellent service and making my special day so memorable ðŸ™‚
~Cherry
The food is good the ambiance is fantastic.Phung is verry accommodating. its a 10/10.

Had a magical night here at Cloud Nine. The food was splendid. The ambiance was luxurious and relaxing. The service was top-notch.

I had both the special menuâ€™s 5 course meal. Each and every course was such a delight.

Anh Tran was very nice and accommodating. She would regularly check up on us to ensure everything was going well.

Overall, I would come back again when I am in town. This experience is truly amazing and is a highlight of my trip to HCMC.

Cloud Nine Saigon is a place Iâ€™ve had the pleasure of visiting twice now, and itâ€™s clear that the improvements to their menu have made a significant impact. The dishes are not only delicious but also thoughtfully curated, showcasing a refined selection. The staff is attentive, professional, and truly goes above and beyond to ensure a seamless dining experience. The ambiance is warm, romantic, and invitingâ€”perfect for couples looking for a special night out. Itâ€™s truly an ideal spot for those seeking an unforgettable evening in the heart of Saigon.

We were expecting a lot from this restaurant, given the 5/5 rating on Google Maps, which we did not find warranted at all. There certainly were a few amusing "show" elements, with a blow torch here and dry ice there, but the substance--that is, the actual quality of the food and service expertise--was severely lacking. In my 5-course tasting menu, the appetizers were tiny, the salad thereafter ok but not splendid, and the main course average at best. The vegetarian main course was below par (a portion of dry rice, topped with cheese, with a tiny bit of veggies added), barely edible. The price was very high by Saigon standards, especially for what ended up on the plate. To top it all off, the restaurant did not accept USD (unlike pretty much anywhere else in the city), and an extra charge was added to pay by card. There is just no way this place deserves a score that high, and one can only wonder how this is possible.
I'm happy to have an unforgettable birthday. I enjoyed the tasty food and the performance show. I'm very grateful for the wonderful hospitality.Thank you so much.I appreciate it.

What a lovely and elegant place in the middle of Saigon! Food was excellent and service great. We were looked after by Anh Le who ensured our glasses were full and e explained the food ingredients very well! Quiet and relax place to be enjoying great food!

What a wonderful restaurant! At every turn there was a new surprise! The view is on a high floor overlooking the city,  the service is perfect and the food is just spectacular! Vu Le was so helpful and professional as was the woman who first waited on us. A really marvelous restaurant.
Such an amazing restaurant and our waitress Nhung was so lovely
Excellent food and service. Very nice, quiet atmosphere. Expect to pay more, but it's well worth it. A great place to celebrate any occasion with fine dining. Highly recommend.

We had the most amazing experience at Cloud Nine Restaurant ! Everything from start to finish was amazing . Our server Ngan Ngo was so lovely and very attentive .Ngan had a really lovely manner and nothing  was too much trouble . We would definitely recommend this restaurant , 11 out of 10 for sure ! Thank you so much ! X

I had a wonderful experience at Cloud Nine Saigon, and I was especially impressed by the professionalism and friendliness of Tong, the bartender.

From the moment I arrived, Tong made me feel welcomed with his warm and attentive service. Not only were his drinks delicious and beautifully presented, but his deep knowledge of cocktails and his thoughtful recommendations truly enhanced my experience. He communicated with such politeness and always wore a genuine smile, creating a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere throughout the evening.

Each drink he crafted had a perfect balance of flavor and aesthetics, clearly showing his passion for mixology. What stood out even more was his attention to detail, ensuring every guest felt satisfied and well taken care of.

Cloud Nine is already known for its elegant setting and refined cuisine, but itâ€™s the dedication of staff like Tong that truly makes it a memorable destination. I will definitely return and highly recommend it to friends.

Delicious Happy Birthday Surprise. I ordered the Australian Tenderloin, cooked Medium it was not overcooked and was perfect. Everything was delicious, Spicy fried noodles no meat, Pho, Spaghetti Bolognese, spring shrimp rolls, Chicken roulade, Chief salad, Vietnamese coffee and crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e .

I recently had the pleasure of visiting Cloud 9 and was truly impressed by its elegant atmosphere, breathtaking view, and outstanding service. Itâ€™s the perfect spot to unwind after a long day or enjoy a stylish night out with friends or loved ones.

One of the highlights of my visit was the bar, which not only offered creative and well-balanced cocktails but was also staffed by an excellent bartender named Tong. He was not only skilled in mixology but also incredibly friendly and attentive. Tong took the time to recommend drinks based on my preferences, and thanks to his finesse, I ended up enjoying one of the best cocktails Iâ€™ve had in a long timeâ€”unique, smooth, and perfectly crafted.

Overall, Cloud 9 exceeded my expectations in every way. From the ambiance and food quality to the drinks and top-notch service, everything was five-star. A special thank you to bartender Tong for making the night extra memorable.

This restaurant was luxurious and made me feel fancy. The food was impeccably good and made my stomach very happy. The workers are extremely welcoming and helpful. Although the portions are small, the food is the best Iâ€™ve tasted in my entire life â€” and Iâ€™ve eaten a lot of food. This was the best restaurant Iâ€™ve ever visited in my entire life, and I definitely recommend it.

Interesting place. The atmosphere was great, it's a beautiful location with great views, and a great decor.

Service was friendly and attentive.

Presentation on food was great, cocktails were great.

Why 4*? The food was just average. We both had different tasting menus, so tried a total of 10 dishes. Everything was ok. The presentation on a few were amazing, but the actual taste was pretty meh.

Our family absolutely loved our experience at your restaurant! Your service was outstanding, and every staff from the bar to the kitchen, all the food servers and receptionists made us feel so welcome. Tje food was delicious - the definitely worth returning. One of the best meals and the best place we have had in a while. Thank you so much for such a wonderful service. We can't wait to come back! Anh Le and others are so great!

Cloud Nine Restaurant was such a nice surprise â€“ great vibes and a cool view.
The food was super tasty, especially Seafood ConsommÃ© and Truffle Spaghetti.
Staff were really friendly and made us feel welcome.
Prices were fair for what you get.
Definitely a spot Iâ€™d go back to with friends!

I had a delicious breakfast at cloud nine restaurant this morning.  The inviting soft music and beautiful tables chairs and sofas were backdrop for delicious sausages, congee, eggs, and noodles. The server, a polite and engaging young man, named Anh on his name tag, even explained the street layout and suggested several sites for my walking adventures in ho chi m8nh, as he served hot coffee with condensed milk.  A great way to start my sight seeing tour of this interesting city today! Delicious!

A truly elevated dining experience.

We enjoyed an exquisite pescatarian meal that delighted the palate. The flavors were refined, beautifully balanced, and left us genuinely impressed. The staff were warm, attentive, and professional, striking the perfect balance between hospitality and discretion. The ambience was serene and thoughtfully curated, with dÃ©cor that complemented the experience perfectly.

Absolutely amazing experience. We had Phung as our server tonight. I organised a special night for my girlfriend and was not disappointed. I had the restaurant contact me in advance for offering a birthday package. It was well worth it. A bouquet of flowers always makes women happy.

Can't recommend cloud nine enough. The tenderloin is amazing and my partner had braised sea bass with steamed rice. Both were absolutely amazing. My partner loved the baileys espresso martini! They even played a happy birthday song over the speakers whilst they brought out a cake for her birthday.

Next time I'm in Saigon I will be back!

Exceptional dining experience, one of the best weâ€™ve had - food, service and atmosphere top notch. In addition to the wonderful presentations and the delicious food, we love the personal service we got from everyone, especially Thanh with all his magic demonstrations. We would love to come back on our next visit. Thank you Cloud Nine.

We had a fantastic dinner at Cloud Nine restaurant on our holiday to Ho Chi Minh. The ambience is fantastic, the service is impeccable, and the food is outstanding.. Special shout out to Phung Huynh who served us with such a sweet smile..  kudos to the whole team. Keep up the great work! ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ˜€

Had an amazing dinner at Cloudnine in Ho Chi Minh City. We went for the steak tenderloin set menu and every course was spot on â€” really tasty and beautifully plated. Our waiter, Anh Le, was brilliant. Super attentive and made the whole experience feel special with a bit of flair when serving. Great food, great service, and surprisingly good value for a fine dining spot. Would definitely go back.
Very nice and cozy ambient with amazing service. We celebrate 6 months anniversary and they very look after us.

My last meal in Saigon was phenomenal! My server Phung was excellent!! She provided top-notch customer service and offered great recommendations from the menu!
Cloud Nine restaurant was the perfect place for my last supper in Saigon!! Thank you, Phung and Cloud Nine for a stellar evening!
Went here for our anniversary and it was wonderful, service and quality of the food is magnificent.

We had a lovely meal at Cloud Nie Restaurant at La Siesta Hotel. Lovely atmosphere,  beautiful food and polite, knowledgeable staff. Especially Phung Huynh who tended to us and served us very professionally and attentively. She was a wonderful advertisement for the hotel and a pleasure. We had a lovely time.
The servers were all so kind and gave us complimentary drinks and appetizer. Would definitely come back!

My partner and I had our first dinner here after landing in Ho Chi Minh. The food is incredible, from presentation to taste. Shout out for our lovely server Phung Huynh who looked after us so well. Highly recommend!

Beautiful setting and amazing food. The set menu was delicious and the chef has put on a great show for serving the dishes.

Thang was a great host and itâ€™s somewhere we definitely be returning.
Nhung was my server for my solo date night and she treated me the best! I did the full course menu option with two cocktails. Walking out of here full and satisfied!

This restaurant is a true gem in Saigon. The food is absolutely delicious, music supports an elevated dinner atmosphere and the drinks are to the point. Jayden and his team are super friendly and attentive. Any time we celebrate an occasion we come here.

Cloud Nine Restaurant was an amazing experience! The food was delicious, beautifully presented, and full of flavor. The staff were friendly and attentive, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. I especially loved the cozy interior and relaxing vibe. Highly recommended for anyone looking for great food and excellent service!

Cloud Nine is an absolute must visit in HCMC.
The Tenderloin and Wagyu Pho were both amazing!
Anh Le was a very friendly host and the Tenderloin fire show was an unforgettable experience.

Make sure you head upstairs after dinner for cocktails and an incredible view of the city.
We had wonderful (and fancy!) dinner at Cloud Nine.  Everything was artfully presented and the waiter and his team were fantastic.  They gave beautiful views of HCMC!

OMG, save up and go, this is an absolutely awesome experience. My wife and I went on our last dinner before leaving Vietnam, our only regret we couldnâ€™t go back. Wine list was great for the region, service and attentive staff impeccable. After dinner make sure you go upstairs to the sky bar to take in the awesome views (restaurant will also give you a voucher after dining). Canâ€™t say enough!!!
Great spot for some modern Vietnamese / western food. Definitely get the scallops with foie gras. The bak kut teh is a little salty though...

This was one of the best dinners Iâ€™ve ever had for under $50. The food was just out of this world and the overall ambiance was great. Definitely a 5 star restaurant. Nhung was incredible! Ask for her as your server!
Simply delightful, from cocktails to main course and dessert. Highly recommended. Short ribs were amazing. And that corn crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e, oh my!!
Great last night in. Saigon! The food and atmosphere was first class and the service was OUTSTANDING. Special shout out to Nhung who made the whole night extra special for us. Highly recommend.
We hand a wonderful dinner tonight with Nhung helping us throughout the night. My husband and I both had sea bass - one braised and one grilled. They were both delicious!
This place is such a delight to visit. They were attentive and has amazing service.

Our server Anh really made our night pleasant.
The food and service was absolute top notch, cant wait to come back in the future!
The Special Menu Set was amazing and delicious! Our waitress Phung Huynh was really nice. Overall it was a great experience in Ho Chi Minh.

Such an amazing dining experience! Showcooking, service is great and we had a wonderfull birthday celebration Here. They also serve good cocktails. After the dinner there is a rooftop bar on top for Some more drinks and a good view over the city
A very friendly and delicious restaurant with a classy vibes.  Most enjoyable evening

Great food indeed. All dishes were a surprise.
Attentive service, Phung was very nice and proactive. Nice atmosphere. Definitely recommended.
Nice restaurant, friendly staff. The food is delicious and beautifully decorated but the portions are small.

Lovely food and personal service - thank you Nhung
Great after dinner drink - thank you Truong
Nice music - couldnâ€™t fault anything

My partner and I recently had the pleasure of dining at Cloud Nine Saigon, and it was truly an unforgettable experience.
As soon as we entered, we were captivated by the sophisticated Indochina-inspired design. The soft lighting, plush seating, and panoramic views of the city skyline created an atmosphere of warmth and intimacy. The gentle background music added to the romantic ambiance, making it feel like we were in our own private world .
The staff at Cloud Nine went above and beyond to make our evening special. Particularly memorable were Quoc do, Hien do, Thanh le whose genuine smiles and attentive service made us feel like honored guests. Their thoughtful gestures, such as personalized recommendations and ensuring our comfort throughout the evening, added a personal touch that enhanced our dining experience.
The menu at Cloud Nine offers a delightful fusion of Vietnamese and international flavors. We started with the lobster bisque, which was rich and flavorful. For the main course, I opted for the Australian tenderloin, while my partner chose the lamb chopsâ€”both were cooked to perfection, tender, and juicy. To finish, we indulged in the crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e and chocolate mousse, both of which were decadent and satisfying .
Cloud Nine Saigon isn't just a restaurant; it's a destination for romance. The combination of exquisite cuisine, impeccable service, and a breathtaking setting makes it the perfect place to celebrate love and create lasting memories. Whether it's an anniversary, a special date night, or simply a desire to indulge in luxury, Cloud Nine Saigon is a must-visit.
Had tuan anh as my waiter and was excellent from start to finish. Definately recommend the set menu as it had many of flavors. Will definately come back again 10/10.
Everything was absolutely perfect. Than, our waiter was outstanding. We enjoyed a lot
I had a great experience last night at your restaurant and I want to mention the waitress named Nhung, she so friendly and attentive. Beautiful place and great staff!!

I figured I should say something after my third time at this wonderful restaurant! The WOW factor is everywhere from the moment you walk in. Service is fantastic, and Iâ€™m happy to mention the lovely Ms Nhung, who is just a joy to engage with and so very helpful. Wow for the food! Presentation is amazing, and everything is crazy delicious. Ambiance is a Wow as well. Canâ€™t recommend this place more highly. Enjoy a spectacular dinner, then head up to the equally amazing sky bar.
Came with my partner for anniversary, really good atmosphere for couple. Wonderful service and location. Recommended!
The whole staff were very great! It made our special day more special. Thank you so much! Will definitely come back here.

amazing food. amazing atmosphere. and even better staff. if you donâ€™t come here youâ€™re missing out. would come back again no problem

shout out to Nhung Do!

Wonderful atmosphere, delicious food and great service! I highly recommend for fine dining in Saigon. Our waitress was Nhung and she did amazing work giving recommendations and making dining experience pleasant. I hope we can return.

We were staying at the sister hotel. Disappointed there is no loyalty programme or discount for guests. Cocktails better in sister hotel. Food fine but not amazing for the cost. Wine selection was well chilled. Water pricey. Poor dessert selection so didnâ€™t bother.
It was convenient for us to visit but not sure the whole experience was worth 4.5m vnd for one course & a bottle of wine for two people.

Bad service. As soon as I walked in I told staffs at lobby I was going to the restaurant. Why not telling me that when I first came in the lobby or while I was sitting in the lobby?!
We just walked by and found this beautiful restaurant on 11st floor. Outside, Inside make your choice.

Planned this a nice dinner celebration with my mom and disappointing experience. mr.C's, he was wonderful! Very kind, attentive, and took great care of every customer. Maybe because we were having such a great time that day, he gave us extra delicious food and a cute little gift to take home.

Overall, Mr. C Bar is a must-visit destination in Vung Tau, combining great drinks, a vibrant sports vibe, and outstanding food. Highly recommended!

Mr. C's now offering a great breakfast option with daily specials. A good alternative with all bacon, ham and sausage smoked and made on site. Super friendly staff and owner! And always playing current North American Sports! Lets go Blue Jays! Lets go Oilefs!

Cozy, rustic, and welcoming place with delicious food â€” especially the grilled dishes!

Nice chilled place to go, pizza is great, cold beer and good service.  I definitely recommend to try here.
The pizza is delicious. The owner is professional. The restaurant is clean. I love it. I highly recommend it.
Great place to come for ice cold beers and quality food and service... sports on TV and wood fire oven.. friendly locals too... I come back every time I am in vt.. thanks team ðŸ‘ŒðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸºðŸ•

What a great experience we had here. 2 years in a row, back to the same place, for drinks and a feed. Great atmosphere, great prices, even greater pizza!!! Thanks Randy and team for a wonderful few nights visiting Vung Tau, you made our stay so welcoming! Do not miss this place if you are in town!

What can I say. I've been coming to Vietnam for 15 years and lived here for 1 year in 2014. The Mr C Special Pizza ðŸ• is the best I've had anywhere in VN and up there with pizzas back in Australia. We would take very serious the negative reviews, and in particular,  the responses from the owner, which we believe is everything thatâ€™s wrong.

The photo doesnâ€™t lie... that pizza is blackened all around the edges. Not â€œcharredâ€ or â€œwood-fired rusticâ€, just burnt.

Burnt is burnt.

Go online and search for wood fired pizza from any reputable place in VÅ©ng TÃ u.

Youâ€™ll see blistered spots and a bit of darkening, not a crust that looks like charcoal. Thereâ€™s a big difference between flavor from fire and flat out overcooking.

Even the other pizza pics from here look normal. Why so defensive?

That isnâ€™t "wood-fired flavor", itâ€™s a mistake that should have never left the kitchen.

Instead of apologizing and owning it, the owner blamed the customer.

They told them they shouldâ€™ve asked questions before ordering, and that burnt is to be expected.

Crazy.

Then finishes with a patronizing â€œI hope my advice helps with your future dining experiences.â€

Thatâ€™s not accountability. Thatâ€™s arrogance.

Geeze... Customers donâ€™t need to interrogate a restaurant before placing an order. To look around and check the food.

They need a business that simply takes pride in its product.

Based on the owners' responses to negative reviews,  with that attitude, imagine what would have happened if the customers had said something when they were here.

Scary.

This is exactly why people speak up in reviews, because clearly, if they had spoken up in person, theyâ€™d have been dismissed just the same.

Randy has this friendly place with pizza oven where you feel like you are back home!

I had a fantastic time! The pizza was delicious, and the beers were perfectly cold. The owner was really down-to-earth and great to chat with. Listening to the classic rock music was a joy; I could easily have stayed a couple more hours.

Terrific place to unwind and meet great friendly people. First class service with a frosty cold beer and am a Pizza cooked by the owner Randy. Best In town.

We had the best time at Mr. C's! There are always a few people there to have a good chat with and the staff is super friendly. Our kid was entertained by the pool table and fish aquariums! This will be our first stop when we're coming back to Vung Tau next time.
Open area bar/pub, relaxed atmosphere, pleasant & friendly service, limited food menu, but the pizzas from the wood-fired oven are probably the very best in Vung Tau!

My go-to place for pizza, speaking as someone who lives here; it's easily the tastiest on offer in Vung Tau. Service is excellent and staff are very friendly and welcoming. Good tunes, inexpensive beer and laid back vibe, ideal.

Group of 13 of us arrived unannounced on a Friday early evening. Quite a large food order and at least 10 other diners also ordering at similar times. Pizzas, Ribs, Wings etc. perfectly timed. We all ate and drank together. Absolutely delicious food. One of our favourite spots in Vung Tau. Cheers to Randy and your staff.

Awesome cozy restaurant and bar. The food is ridiculously good and all hand made in an authentic brick pizza oven. Prices are low considering what you get and the owners are amazing social people. Definitely worth checking it out for supper and drinks!

Ordered an Italian but got a different pizza. Also said no onion. Came with onion. Delivery was late and the price was higher than the one posted online 4 months ago.
Owner rude. Please don't go here.

The pizza portions are really big. Two people can easily share one pizza and feel full. Plus, they are absolutely delicious! They are baked in a specially made stone oven, which makes a big difference. You should definitely try this placeâ€”itâ€™s amazing! The only downside is that itâ€™s a bit expensive for Vietnam, but itâ€™s totally worth the price.

Great little pub with a wide variety of patrons from all over the world who make you feel welcome. We had pizza and the amazing ribs and watched Australian rugby league and had a natter with the regulars
Great bar with great food. Wonderful service and now with expanded menu. Pizzas the highlight!
Great place to hang out. Food is banging. Huge portions. Drinks are decent and a pool table out the back. Will be there next time I'm in Vung Tau. Thanks Andy

What a absolutely  lovely  place ,to eat a fantastic  pizza  ,and to chat  with the  owner  and patrons,  thanks  so much  to you  all ,for  making  our  last  couple  of days  in Vung tau  memorable  ,cheers  xx Chris and  Donald  ,see you  next  time
Pizza there is best in this city. Great guy. I send best regards ðŸ˜Š

Two Canadians walk into a barâ€¦ and five hours later, theyâ€™re still there! Thatâ€™s exactly what happened to us at this incredible spot. The people were so amazingâ€”friendly, hilarious, and downright delightfulâ€”that we completely lost track of time just hanging out. It felt like we were at a backyard party with old friends!

Oh, and the food? Donâ€™t even get me started. The Woodfire pizza was a masterpieceâ€”the crust was *perfectly cooked*, with that ideal balance of crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside, and the smoky flavor from the woodfire oven took it to another level. And the chicken wings? They were cooked *inside the woodfire oven* too, giving them this incredible smoky, crispy perfection that had us licking our fingers clean.

If youâ€™re looking for great food, great vibes, and a place where time flies, this is it. Just donâ€™t blame me if you end up staying for five hours too!

Where do I start,, we arrived and didn't feel at all welcome, we ordered a pizza  and waited well over an hour for it to arrive. Pizza wasn't bad but was far from good. Base was far to thick and all the edges were burnt black but very expensive and when it came to paying, the final bill, it came to 335k with a drink,, paid the lady 435k so I'd get 100k back and she just said thank you and kept the change.
Would not recommend this place or the burnt food
Best pizza in Vung Tau. Ice cold beers too. Great for watching NFL, NHL.

This is a must visit pub. The food is incredible. The hospitality is the best in Vung Tau and they have North American Sports.

Randy and Tam are great hosts.
Best pizza in Vung Tau and Randy is a great host.  Very kid friendly and good for families.

I was craving pizza yesterday, had read some glowing reviews about Mr. Câ€™s pizza, thought to myself, this couldnâ€™t be true so stopped in for some take away to see if the hype was for real. Randy and his lovely lady have a great vibe, the place is cozy, charming and inviting with a pool table in the back surrounded by tanks of colorful fish. Took the pizza home, the #3 ( most popular according to customers) and it was still piping hot as it had just come out of the wood-fire oven, took one bite and was utterly convinced, this is absolutely the best pizza in Vung Tau. I consider myself a pizza connoisseur, having had pizza all over the world, including Italy. Crust was perfectly crisp yet soft, toppings and sauce plentiful with complexity of fresh seasoned flavors with the perfect amount of melted cheese. I am converted. Mr, Câ€™s wears the crown.
My family had already had dinner so I enjoyed the pizza myself, I couldnâ€™t stop eating even though I was totally full and almost finished the whole pie.
Randy and staff, you have won over a new customer so youâ€™ll have to get used to seeing our faces!
By the way. Iâ€™ve got 2 nice pieces of gnarly wood to add to your fish tanks Iâ€™ll bring by next time.
Great place for good pizzas ðŸ• and chicken wings and other food. Also a great place for a beer and a chat...
Pizza was a 10, fr. The lady running register was best bar staff ever, johnny on the spot type ish for food and drinks. Great atmosphere.

recommended for dinner and a couple of drinks. the pizza is excellent, the staff are super nice, and the outdoor area is nice and open. thereâ€™s a decent pool table inside too. not sure iâ€™d hang out here too often just for beers, as it felt kinda like a sports bar, with an older expat crowd and families, so maybe not the best choice if youâ€™re younger and want to meet people. definitely worth checking out for the food and friendly service regardless.

Best bar in Vung Tau, with the best host. Great pizza, wings and ribs, and if you're stuck Randy (the host) will look after you. We arrived after breakfast had finished, but before dinner service, so he rustled up a great sandwich with his homemade bacon! Can't say enough good about the place or the owner!

Awesome pizza and great people. Having tried numerous pizza in Vung Tau over the years, Randy has mastered it. Stone oven, very tasty toppings and the pizza was not soggy like so many others. Perfect. Had pizza #2.

Nice to meet you guys this evening!

Chris, another canuck!
Casual bar with amazing wood-fired pizza, and great service. Only place you can get a really good Caesar as well.
Great pizzas from Randy and his wood fired oven. Always a pleasure in this friendly place. Never go to Vung Tau without a visit. Also good for Canadian sports :)
Amazing!  Great pizza and atmosphere ðŸ¤©

I was a regular of Tommy's bar in its time.

The booming Karaoke from next door.... or perhaps cats were being strangled????? ..... didn't detract from this warm, friendly, superb venue and jolly decent host.
We'll be back.

The only food I miss from home is pizza couple friends took me here the pizza here is one of the best I have ever had and I don't mean in Vietnam you gota try it most pizza here is Ketchup on toast. also ice cold beers and great staff

After looking for good pizza in HCMC and Vung Tau Mr C's checks all the boxes. Wood fired, good crust and fresh ingredients. Delicious and healthy.

It's such an awesome place. Appreciate you Randy, Tam, Bill,  & the rest of the crew for welcoming  me to Mr C's.  Whats not  to like about having cold beer, while eating delicious  food with cool folks from all around the World.  Mr C's rocks!!
Best pub in the area! Great staff, super friendly, two tvs to watch sport and Awsum pizzas made by the owner. Highly recommend a visit
Excellent service and very welcoming. Randy and Tam are fantastic hosts offering outstanding friendly service. The wood fired pizzas are the best you will find in vietnam.
Nice ambiance. Good food. Wood fired pizza oven. Cold Huda beer. Reasonable price.

Family with small children, we were looking for a cozy space for dinner. Mr.C was just right. Delicious food, enthusiastic advice from the owner ^^
