I am a Vietnamese who works far away and comes home, I was walking along the beach and accidentally saw the restaurant, with a well-maintained oven, and I felt it would be delicious. We ordered a pizza and it was delicious, rich in flavor and I really liked the crust. The beers were also well priced, the space was comfortable, the waitress was very attentive and cheerful, she even turned on the fan for me, afraid we would be hot. The restaurant should have some country music, it would be more suitable and wonderful. Next time we go home, we will visit the pizza restaurant again.

Extremely delicious pizza. Going to Vung Tau, I was bored with seafood so I wandered around looking for a delicious pizza restaurant to change the taste and accidentally chose a super delicious restaurant. Pizza is baked in a charcoal oven. The crust is homemade by a Westerner so it is very crispy and soft. Rustic style and not the common dry crust like other types of pizza. In general, if you go to Vung Tau and are bored with seafood, you should try this restaurant. Guaranteed delicious pizza at a reasonable price. The only regret is that there is no parking space. But you can still park at a neighbor's house :)).

The food was delicious! We had breakfastâ€”an egg sandwich and a ham and cheese sandwich.
We'll be back for pizza!
The staff is still learning, so please be understanding.

Second time eating pizza here, the pizza is very delicious, very impressive, and it also comes with cold beer. Overall, I am impressed with the restaurant and will definitely visit again. Some small suggestions: 1. They should make many sizes of pizza because the pizza is so big that it can be eaten by 2 young people. 2. Because the pizza takes a long time to bake, the restaurant should have some snacks while waiting. 3. It would be even better if there was draft beer.
Delicious food, enthusiastic service, cute staff, clean food, airy space suitable for young people to try

The space is quite chill but sitting under the trees, sometimes there will be "strange objects" falling down. The food is handmade so it is very delicious and full. In my opinion, the price is quite cheap compared to the amount of food and the market, especially the pizza. Because I personally eat bland food, I find it a bit salty. The foreign owner seems to be from Canada, very quick and hospitable, the food is made by himself, the oven-baked pizza is very appealing.
The owner goes to great lengths to make American-style (Australian?) pizzas over a wood-fired oven, despite the ambient heat. The prices are reasonable and the service is friendly.

The space is airy, the owner is extremely friendly and always creates a happy and comfortable atmosphere for customers. The food here suits our group's taste very well, moreover, the portions are large, suitable for those with a healthy appetite or sharing with family/group of friends.

Pizza is delicious, not greasy, crispy crust because it is handmade right in the oven. The shop should sell snacks to eat while waiting for the pizza to bake. The space is quiet because not many people know about the shop, but I like it that way ðŸ¤£

Great stay at Hafi Hotel VÅ©ng TÃ u!

I had a really pleasant experience here. The hotel is clean, modern, and very comfortable. The location is super convenient â€” just a short walk to the beach and close to many local food places and cafÃ©s. The staff were friendly and helpful throughout my stay.

The price was also very reasonable for what you get â€” great value compared to many other hotels in the area. The pool area was nice and relaxing, and the room had everything I needed. I would definitely recommend Hafi Hotel to anyone visiting VÅ©ng TÃ u, and Iâ€™ll be happy to come back again! ðŸŒ´

This hotel is just a 5-minute walk to the beach and offers reasonable prices. The rooms are clean, and although the staff donâ€™t speak English, they are very friendly and welcoming.

However, the hotel restaurant was quite disappointing â€” the food was poorly prepared, and unfortunately, there are no other dining options nearby. We had to take a taxi into the city for every meal, which became quite inconvenient.

Tip for future guests: If you plan to stay here, consider bringing some food with you or arranging transport in advance for meals, as there are very limited options in the area.

I randomly selected this hotel after an stress-filled day of traveling by motorbike.  I was in serious need of rest, and this hotel was the one nearest me.

The reception staff were kind and efficient at check-in.  My room was spacious and clean.  I spent two relaxing nights before  continuing on my cross-country travel (although I was tempted to stay a third: the bed was like resting on a cloud).  The water pressure and temp was excellent and I especially enjoyed the balcony access.

This hotel is new and the area surrounding it was in development during my stay.  Beach access is within walking distance (less than a 5 minute walk) and their onsite dining facilities provide a decent number of dishes from which to choose.

One note of mention - there was a moment of confusion during my stay.  The subject of the confusion is not significant, but what is significant is how the staff handled the matter.  Each staff member took time to listen and offer support within their capability.  Ultimately, the situation was resolved, and the staff were quite gracious in accepting responsibility in the situation.  They even discounted my second night's stay to apologize for the misunderstanding.  I am very appreciative of their approach to customer service and business management.

I will choose this hotel again the next time I travel to Vung Tau.

Nice hotel with loyal prices and friendly staff. Basically, local residents from other cities relax there on holidays and weekends. We were on holiday at the beginning of September, it was free, except for Vietnam Independence Day.

Good location. But if you don't plan to spend the whole day by the sea, you will need a means of transportation to get into town, such as a motobike. It's easy rent one in the town.
Clean and big room, quiet place for familt relaxing. Nice staffs. Highly recommend.

Fresch room and pool. The bed were lovely to live. The hotel staff is nice. It is only breakfast that will affect stars, it is limited to choose, one meal + drink is include in price and if you want get more, so you will pay extra.
All new facilities, close to the beach, 20 minutes on bike to get to town

Affordable price for family, nice location, the beach is quite dessert but clean.
The hotel room was spacious. The staff was very friendly, especially Manager Ha.

ðŸŒ´ 5-star rating for a great resort!
I was really satisfied after my stay here. The resort is clean, airy and close to the sea, extremely convenient for walking to watch the sunrise or swimming in the early morning.
ðŸ’š The staff, kitchen and security are all very cute, enthusiastic and friendly, always supporting guests thoughtfully.
ðŸš— Spacious and cool parking space, surrounded by coconut trees creating a feeling of relaxation, close to nature.
ðŸ³ Delicious breakfast, diverse dishes and clean preparation. In any area, you can feel the absolute neatness and hygiene.
In short, the money spent is completely worth the quality of service and space here.
ðŸ‘‰ I will definitely come back and recommend it to friends and relatives!

I didn't take a photo of the room because it was a bit messy, but the room was spacious like the advertised picture. My room had two balconies, price 850k from Saturday to Sunday, good soundproofing and a diverse breakfast buffet. The hotel has a swimming pool and the beach is about a 2-minute walk away. The beach at Long Cung tourist area is a bit far from the center so it is also deserted and quiet. Suitable for relaxation.

I've really stopped worrying after following this hotel for years, when I saw the bad review, I was nervous but still decided to choose this hotel for my family's 3-day-2-night trip. 
Unlike the other review, the hotel is better than expected, spacious and clean. The staff is ok and pleasant, supporting me in everything. 
My baby just came out with a blanket and pillow, the hotel still supported enthusiastically, but I was also embarrassed. 
Although the breakfast is not as good as 4-star or 5-star, every dish is delicious, the refill is okay, there are not enough tables on weekends, sitting together is a bit awkward. But I think it's ok, that's enough food. As long as it's delicious, it's fine. 
As for the floor, it's true that it's wet, the hotel should add a mat or towel when entering the hotel from the pool or the beach to avoid getting the floor wet and then put it in the elevator, it looks a bit dirty and slippery. 
When I noticed the floor was a bit damp, I asked for an extra mat and the staff supported it ok. The garden and swimming pool are ok. Going to the beach is not too close if you walk. Kkkkkkk my legs are tired. But it's still fun. The beach is clean.
At night, if you go by car, you will return around 10pm when the street lights turn off at the Long Cung beach sign, so it will be a bit inconvenient to go by motorbike. Cars are ok.
Oh, the room has a sea view but the view is not very good because the trees cover it. It will be clearer on the 3rd floor, I'm on the 2nd floor kkkkk.
I hope Hafi will maintain this quality and develop more and more so that next time I can introduce more friends and continue to support the hotel when I have the opportunity to visit the back beach in Ho Chi Minh City! Wish all the staff good health.

10Ä‘ no but.

The location of Long Cung beach is not noisy and bustling, very quiet but the view of the sea and the back beach.

The hotel has a large parking lot, the receptionist is quick and enthusiastic. The rooms are clean, fully equipped and have a very large balcony view. The breakfast is full and very delicious - especially the drinks are very delicious. Will support when there is a next opportunity because the price is worth the money.

As a person working in the service industry, I had a quite peaceful and satisfying experience at Hafi. The room is clean, beautiful, fully equipped, the staff is very friendly, the area outside the hotel is quite large, parking is free, there is even a swimming pool, for children who cannot swim, there are staff to teach them how to swim. The hotel is also near the beach, only 5 minutes walk. Although the breakfast is a bit limited, it has all the basics such as drinks and fried eggs, quite impressive, although it is a small hotel, the juices are all made from fresh ingredients, not from canned products like some other big hotels. However, there are also some minus points such as the cleanliness of the hallways and stairs, the walkways are a bit dirty, the elevator is not clean because guests get wet from swimming in the sea and the pool, it is easy to slip and fall. The price is also reasonable if you do not have too high a demand for luxury or professionalism. It is worth the experience, I have tried it and will come back.

My family just had a good experience at the hotel.
- Space: quiet, clean. There is a beach next to the hotel, the beach is quite private
- Location: 6-7 minutes drive from Thuy Van beach
- Interior: clean, simple decoration creates an airy feeling, has swimming pools for adults and children
- Spacious rooms, clean and beautiful toilets. The breakfast buffet has limited dishes but all the dishes are delicious.
A suitable place for those who like privacy, relaxation, and quiet.

The hotel is located in Long Cung beach area. This is a newly opened location and not in the center of Vung Tau but I like it. I don't like crowded places anymore. I stayed in a room with 2 corners overlooking the sea, the room was spacious and very clean, the hotel has a swimming pool. The staff is lovely from the security to the receptionist. The extra dish for 10k/stick is also very delicious. The buffet in the morning is also quite ok.

Great, I just had a vacation with my lover on June 1, 2025 at Hafi Hotel. 

The hotel is beautiful, luxurious, clean. The surrounding area is generally quiet, isolated from the outside, not a crowded, noisy residential area; the road is wide and airy. I booked a sup room with a street view at the cheapest price, but it was quite spacious and comfortable, not stuffy, with a cool balcony. 

The room is clean, neatly decorated, thick curtains to block the sun, when closed it is dark and cool. Big TV, Youtube, Netflix and other apps available. The refrigerator works well, really cold. The bed is very big, 4 people can lie down. The blanket is thick and warm. 

The bathroom is clean, drains quickly. 

Good soundproofing, I can't hear anything from the rooms next door, but I can still hear sounds from the hallway (small sound). That night, there was karaoke outside, so when you close the balcony door, you can't hear anything anymore, but when people shoot fireworks, you can still hear the popping sound of fireworks (very small). In short: you can hear the sound from the hallway, you can't hear the sound from the next room, the balcony is well soundproofed from the outside. 

The room price also includes a breakfast buffet ticket. The breakfast at the hotel is highly appreciated by my lover and me, quite delicious and clean. The main buffet line doesn't have too many dishes, only about 10 dishes, but all of them are delicious. There are mixed salads, cherry tomatoes and french fries, the french fries are not soggy and are very tasty. There are also many desserts, including fruits and jelly of all kinds. 

The shared swimming pool is large, the water is clean. There is a water tap for guests from the sea at the hotel gate. 

The two nearest beaches are Long Cung and Thuy Tien. I went to Thuy Tien beach, about 100m further than Long Cung, I didn't rent a seat, I just went down and swam. 

A bit far from the city center, about 10-15 minutes by motorbike into the city, in return the space is quiet, very chill, if you book a delux room or higher, there is a very beautiful sea view. When I booked early directly with the hotel via hotline, I also got a discount. 

The hotel staff, including the security guard who watches the car, are also very cute and enthusiastic. Vung Tau ice cream 10k is also very delicious, fragrant and rich in flavor, my lover really likes the matcha flavor. 

The trip at Hafi is worth the money, it will definitely be the place I think of when I want to come back.

The soundproofing is quite okay, the furniture in the room uses new technology so it is quite modern. However, the room uses yellow light so there is not enough light for the wife to do makeup. Anyone with a wife or girlfriend should bring a lamp. The service is attentive and there is additional support. Very enthusiastic.

Good place for families or couples on weekdays. Prices are a bit high on weekends. The hotel has a small swimming pool and is very close to the beach. This area is very quiet. In general, those who like quiet can choose to rest.

The room is beautiful and worth the price (I went on a weekday and applied 7749 discount codes to 500k/room), and you guys upgraded my room to a suit (2 balconies)
The service is super good, there is a delicious buffet breakfast at the line counter and lots of food.
The reception staff are very enthusiastic. We checked out but left our luggage, then came back to get our luggage and asked to borrow the bathroom to shower again. They were still ok and did not charge any extra fee â¤ï¸

There is one minus point, the mirror in the room, it's weird and I get dizzy when looking in it, so I didn't SF in front of the mirror even though the room is very beautiful, spacious and airy ðŸ’•

Thank you guys for giving me a very worthy trip, after the hustle and bustle of work â¤ï¸
See you guys next time, I will definitely come back

The hotel is ok, convenient for families, a bit far from the city, quiet area, rooms with windows open to the sea.
Breakfast has delicious crab noodle soup.
The swimming pool is ok, clean water, no smell.
Parking in the hotel, spacious.

This is in the outskirts of Vung Tau, Long Cung section.
The hotel does not have a sea view, so if you want a sea view, this is not the right choice.
I want to stay in a quiet place so I chose to stay here, a bit far but comfortable.
There is a breakfast buffet, the food is okay, not many dishes but overall it is okay.
The staff is cute and enthusiastic.
Clean.
The only downside is that the toilet paper is only 1 roll :)))) if there is still a little bit of water, it would be better to leave a whole roll as a spare.

This is the second time I have stayed at Hafi. The hotel is okay, but it is near other villa rental houses so it will be noisy at night. In addition, the location is quite inconvenient if you take a bus because many buses will not transfer to this Long Cung area.
The hotel is very clean, the room has a very nice sea view, delicious breakfast, spacious parking, very reasonable price, but the distance to the center is a bit far, the resort is very ok

Going in the low season so the price is quite ok
A la carte breakfast is ok
Near Long Cung beach
Swimming pool is ok
However, I am not very satisfied with the room, the room was not cleaned properly, the floor still had a lot of sand, the mattress was also sandy, I don't know if it will be replaced

This place is far from the center, but from the service to the quality of the rooms and food, it's 10 points. Enthusiastic, warm, hospitable, well-seasoned and the food portion is so full that you can't breathe ðŸ¥¹ 100 points !!!

Great hotel, great staff. The hotel is located on a wide road, easy to move around, and has a lot of parking. Friendly and enthusiastic staff. When booking on the app, I booked a small room, but when I checked in, the hotel upgraded me to a larger room for free. New facilities. Will come back if I have the chance.

The hotel is clean, spacious, the room is exactly as shown on agoda. I arrived early and was still supported to check in. The staff was enthusiastic. The breakfast buffet was also delicious and filling. However, the location is a bit far from the center. The air conditioner will not be as cold as other places, my room also has a fan. But I think it's okay. I will come back next time.

Going out with friends and staying at Hafi - so good! The hotel is clean, quiet, airy. The room is spacious, has a cool balcony, super big bed. Full amenities, good soundproofing, great for watching movies.

Delicious, quality breakfast buffet. Clean swimming pool, near the sea. Friendly, enthusiastic staff.

In short: worth the money, great for chilling with a group of friends, will definitely come back!

I went with 2 people for this trip, the staff at Hafi were friendly, the rooms were clean so my friend slept all night and didn't want to go anywhere and the breakfast was delicious.
Every corner in Hafi is beautiful for checking in and taking virtual photos.
Although it's far from the center, my friend and I really like it because we don't want noise. It's only 10 minutes to the city.

Advantages: cheap room, location near the sea. 2 minutes walk to the sea. Clean and beautiful beach, swimming pool under the hotel. Friendly and lovely staff.

Disadvantages:
1. The room light is very dim, very uncomfortable for the eyes.
2. The room soundproofing is extremely bad. You can hear the conversation outside. Especially when going to the bathroom outside, you can hear no sound.
3. The breakfast buffet has few dishes, not delicious, overall bad (suitable for the price).
4. The swimming pool is small, not beautiful (suitable for the price).
In general, I will not come back.

Hotel near the sea, airy and spacious. Looks new from the outside but the furniture in the room is not nice. Suitable for the price. Breakfast is enough, not too many dishes. Friendly and enthusiastic staff.

Stayed at the hotel for the third time with my family, very good experience. New hotel, clean and beautiful rooms, modern facilities. My family also got a free room upgrade from the hotel. A small minus point is that the breakfast buffet on weekdays has fewer dishes than on weekends, the food is still delicious.
Polite staff, clean and airy rooms, swimming pool for children to enjoy. But the public beach is difficult to get to and the sea is not very clean.

I am a customer who directly experienced the service, not a clone or a â€œkarma creatorâ€ as the hotel implied. It is really surprising that instead of listening to suggestions to improve, the hotel counted the number of 1-star reviews I had written elsewhere to attack me personally. 

I have traveled a lot, experienced a lot, I am very fair in praising good places, and I reflect the reality of weak places. If the hotel thinks that anyone who dares to give feedback is â€œcreating karmaâ€, then they should STOP providing the service. Because of providing services, if you are afraid of being criticized, like to be praised, and do not accept the truth, then there is a problem. 

I do not need to be â€œforgivenâ€ as the hotel wrote, because I did nothing wrong. What I reflected was the truth I witnessed with my own eyes: dirty rooms, poor hygiene, unprofessional staff, impolite attitude towards guests â€“ and now there is also disrespectful and uncivilized feedback from the management. 

Thanks for confirming why customers are losing trust. With this kind of reaction, whether it is 1 star or 100 stars, I will continue to share the truth, so that other consumers can know and make the right choice.
Guest: Pham Thoai

The hotel is a bit far from the center but the rooms are spacious, modern, clean, the staff is enthusiastic and cute, the beach is only about 100m away. There is a breakfast buffet. There is a swimming pool but during peak hours it is a bit crowded, there are few lights in the room. In short, I am very satisfied! Give the hotel 5 stars

Beautiful room, full amenities, fast elevator, no need to wait like The Song
Affordable price, book 1 week in advance and get 10% discount, enthusiastic staff, unlimited mineral water in the fridge for only 10k fee, and free breakfast at the hotel when booking. 11 points.

My family had dinner here, the waiters were very nice and recommended the dishes to the guests very appropriately. The food in the 2-night set was enough for 3 people to eat, delicious, fresh, enthusiastic service for individual guests like my family even though the restaurant had a group of guests having dinner at that time. Any family who goes on vacation to Hafi does not need to go anywhere to find food, but if you are staying at nearby resorts such as Long Cung, The Aria, Villa areas, just come to Hafi to try, the service is extremely good.

Stayed here twice, very ok, the breakfast buffet is delicious. However, if you go during the week, the swimming pool is used as a swimming class, so hotel guests have no place to swim. Otherwise, it's great. The last meal I stayed for 4 days was great.

Recommend for families with small children and traveling by car. The restaurant serves reasonably priced and delicious dishes. My family always has lunch here at noon, which is very convenient. Because we have a small child, my family doesn't have much need to visit, we mostly stay in the hotel and go to the nearby beach to swim. Will come back again.

I booked a room on a weekday, the price for a 3-person room is 1 million, a single room is 600k. Breakfast is included. I booked 1 day in advance so I got a 10% discount. I arrived early so I waited until almost 1 o'clock to check in. The room was clean and fully equipped.
Everything is satisfactory except for having a swimming center with a pool. The pool is too small so guests can't swim comfortably. The hotel shouldn't rent out pools like that.

The staff helped me upgrade to a room with a super nice view and spacious, the breakfast was delicious, especially the pasta, the staff also took care of me enthusiastically, I told them if I ran out of food they refilled it immediately
The room is very clean, the owner and staff are very nice. In front of the hotel there is also a delicious ice cream shop.
The room is spacious, clean, has a swimming pool, the location is near the beach, very convenient. The breakfast buffet is delicious ðŸ‘ŒðŸ‘ŒðŸ‘Œ

- Room: Overall, it's still clean and a bit new, the bathroom is also relatively clean, the room is cleaned very clean before check-in, the ladies clean meticulously
- Service: the receptionists are enthusiastic, let you check in early if there is a vacant room, the dining area is ok although there are a few dishes, the price is a bit high
- Food: the ladies cook delicious, clean
- Location: near Long Cung area, on Ha Huy Tap street, 300m walk from the beach, the beach in this area is not clean
- Swimming pool area: too crowded, the swimming pool is small, there are also local swimming instructors so it's very crowded

=> Personal opinion: Suitable for family vacations
The room is very nice, the staff is enthusiastic, the food is delicious, the view is nice, the location is not too far from the center, the stone is very smooth

The old toilet was dark and rundown. The housekeeping staff put their slippers straight into the living room. When asked, they replied that they had always cleaned the room like this. What's wrong with cleaning? After staying for 2 nights, the floor was full of dirty sand and dirt every day. The room wasn't clean. The attitude from the staff to the security guard was terrible. They didn't talk to the guests with any subject or predicate. The breakfast buffet was poor, cold, and uninteresting.
The hotel service is very attentive, enthusiastic, and supportive. My company organized a party and the hotel supported us completely. If there is a chance, we will support again next time.
Delicious breakfast, clean room and cool view, swimming pool, near the beach, ok service, enthusiastic staff,

Lovely staff, free room upgrade
Bedroom ok
The bathroom is a bit dark and not very clean, lots of calcium deposits, I'm on the 3rd floor.
The hotel is nice, very clean and the staff are enthusiastic, the hospital is very cute and there is also delicious ice cream.

The staff here are very enthusiastic. I was upgraded to a room with a pretty good sea view
The room is fully furnished and has an umbrella so you can walk to the beach without being exposed to the sun. The TV can screen from the Mac to watch movies, which is also good
The location is a bit far from the center so it's very quiet and it's reasonable to change places to meet deadlines
Big clean swimming pool
The breakfast portion is good and delicious
The road leading in is under construction so it's a bit bad

The food is quite delicious and tasty, the rooms are nice and spacious, I am quite satisfied with the quality of the services
Will come back when going to Vung Tau ðŸ¥°
Clean hotel, affordable price, enthusiastic and attentive staff

The hotel is clean, quiet, good soundproofing and beautifully decorated, 100m from the beach (Thuy Tien beach is clean, clear and the water is warm). The staff is friendly and enthusiastic, the air conditioner is cold and the breakfast buffet is okay, but far from the city center, worth the experience.

I visited Hafi Hotel and stayed for 2 nights for my vacation. The hotel is airy and spacious, the staff from the reception, service and security are all cute and enthusiastic with customers. My room is clean and fully equipped for guests. The breakfast here is delicious, I also got a free dessert plate. Except for the fact that it is a bit far from the center, everything is okay.

The rooms and service are quite good, most of the rooms are new and nicely decorated. The breakfast buffet is okay, some hot dishes like vermicelli soup, fried eggs, crab soup... are mostly clean and tidy. The hotel has a swimming pool in the back which is also clean and has a swimming area for children. The only downside is that it is a bit far from the beach, when I went, the sea was rough so I had to go back to the center to swim at the back beach, in addition, the switch in the room with two large beds and one single bed is quite inconvenient, because if you turn off one switch, all the lights in the room will turn off. The staff is friendly and the room is quite quiet.

Initially I booked a Superior room but the hotel upgraded it to a Deluxe room. I really love the hotel. The room is very clean, airy, and at this price, it has a balcony and includes breakfast, which is great â¤ï¸

The staff is very nice, supporting all my requests. I booked a sup room of 25m2 and the hotel upgraded me to a deluxe room of 32m2, which is more spacious. New furniture, clean swimming pool. Except for being a bit far from the center (15 minutes by motorbike), there is nothing to complain about.

Great experience at Hafi
ðŸŒ¼location:
- not too far from the central area, about 10 minutes by car. This area is under construction so it is quite sad at night and lacks street lights. However, the opposite side of the street is bustling so you can go there to eat and drink at night.
- Near the beach so it takes 2-3 minutes to walk to the beach. This area is new so it is still clean, the sea water is clear enough to see small fish swimming, and there are no street vendors to attract customers.

ðŸŒ¼ Space: spacious, airy, true to the resort style - relax. The white tone looks luxurious, the room is clean and fully equipped. In the lobby there is a dining area and a very convenient toilet. The parking lot is spacious and the security guard has a car card so it is very secure.

ðŸŒ¼ Amenities:
- There is a swimming pool that can be used comfortably when staying here, the pool is clean and there are always people watching when guests go swimming (lifeguards and guests support). There is a separate staircase for guests to go to their rooms if they don't want to go to the main lobby of the hotel if they are wet.
- Because the hotel only has 3 floors, the elevator is very fast and there are 2 elevators. The elevator is also wide and clean
- Delicious breakfast, enthusiastic and thoughtful service
- The receptionist is cheerful and enthusiastic in supporting guests when asked
- The security guard is cheerful and always greets guests every time I take my car in and out

ðŸŒ¼ Price: reasonable, if you book early, you will get a discount. I booked directly with the hotel so the price is better than on the apps

ðŸŒ¸ Disadvantages:
- Due to the construction, the gate has a sandbank that is very difficult to run on and I almost fell here, hopefully the repair will be completed soon or a few bricks will be placed to make driving easier.
- The area right at the entrance is a wardrobe and a mirror, but both lights are not on because they are sensor lights so there is no switch, so the area is dark, going out is dark, the room is dark, I can't do makeup or take pictures because it's dark. When I go to the toilet, I get wet and can't stand in there to do makeup. I hope the hotel will consider supporting to fix the light right at the entrance. 

â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ In short, I will come back many times ðŸ˜‚

Clean and bright rooms
Friendly staff, quick receptionist, easy to talk to
10 points!
The room is nice and clean, there is a clean swimming pool, but it's not too big. Walk to the beach about 10 minutes

I was sad because at first I booked on a fake page, the page said it was a real hotel. Consulting, closing the deal. Even when I said I would go down to the site to check, then that Page texted me asking if I had gone down yet and was waiting. I almost transferred the deposit. And this gg Maps is the official page, everyone. Please click on the phone number on the page to call or find the hotel's website.

The hotel is located near Long Cung beach, has a clean swimming pool. The day I went around, the roads were being renovated so it was quite messy. The service was quite good compared to the price, the room was spacious, clean, with 3-star amenities. 
There was a small problem when checking in but the receptionist later resolved it for my family. Triple room for 4 people on the weekend costs 1020k including buffet breakfast. 

8/10 for this experience
Beautiful hotel, delicious food, clean rooms, enthusiastic support staff ðŸ¤

Clean rooms, friendly staff. Very close to the beach, convenient for those who like to swim without having to go far.

Breakfast is a bit slow. Hopefully next time I use this service, the breakfast buffet will be better.

Very good experience here.
From consulting service, to booking a room, all are attentive and polite. The space is spacious, airy, fully equipped, behind is the sea, there is also a swimming pool - most of the time there is support,... The breakfast buffet is delicious, filled quickly, enough for the weekend because it doesn't arrive until 8:20 but still has a full experience.
The downside is that it is a bit far from the center, with the area still under construction, the road is bad, a bit inconvenient to move around. Booked in a hurry on the weekend so couldn't book a room with a sea view, then a corner view, weekend 900k (with 10% discount - including breakfast buffet), compared to that it is reasonable (even cheap).
A small minus point is that the car rental is bad, the Wave is a plow-style car, driving is also worried about falling off :))

Good customer service, the staff is very cute and enthusiastic. The room is comfortable with a cool balcony, clean bedding, and beautiful decor. I am very happy because the 2 nights here were comfortable, the staff who received us had nothing to complain about. If I have the opportunity to return to Vung Tau, I will definitely come back here.

- The room is very spacious, clean, simple but just enough.
- The breakfast buffet is quite delicious.
- I like the hotel's 2 separate electric and room keys so the room is still cool when I return.
- The swimming pool is super large.
- The staff is enthusiastic and cute.
- The location is far from the center so it is a bit inconvenient for families with small children to travel.
- I had an unpleasant experience when the hotel's rental car broke down in the middle of the road, forcing me to walk a distance, but the owner apologized sincerely and resolved the matter very well. When I returned to Saigon, the staff informed me that I had forgotten my clothes and even enthusiastically shipped them back to me for free. I highly appreciate this point.
=> In short, I think this is a hotel worth staying at when visiting Vung Tau.
Clean, airy rooms, enthusiastic and comfortable staff
The price, quality and service of the hotel are suitable. Near the beach so easy to walk. The beach is not as crowded as Thuy Van beach so comfortable. There is breakfast when renting a room.

The hotel room is beautiful and clean. The staff is super enthusiastic and cute. Although the surrounding scenery has a city view, it is quiet and has good security. Hope the hotel always maintains its reputation, will come back here many more times.
Nice clean room great service
I got a free upgrade to a larger room, everything is very ok, everyone

The restaurant staff here are very enthusiastic and attentive, chubby, the breakfast is delicious, kkk, and the receptionist is also very cute, early check-in and free room upgrade, simple and beautiful room decoration. I really like it and will come back
only the entrance is bad, and the wifi signal is weak, sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't.

HAFI I often stay in Vung Tau starting from 2020. After many years, the rooms are still beautiful, not much degraded, clean. The staff from the security guard to the receptionists are all very nice. I will still choose to stay here if I go to Vung Tau. This time I stayed, the wifi was a bit bad so I had to fix it.

Large room, reasonable price, convenient walk to the beach, good soundproofing, I stayed in a corner room with many doors so during the day the room was as bright as I wanted, the hallway when guests went swimming or going to the beach had water stains, but cleaning was a bit slow so the hallway looked a bit sticky.
The psychology department gives 2 cards, 1 card to attach to the electrical outlet to keep the air conditioner running to cool the room and 1 card to access the door. In the evening, the lights are just enough to chill, there aren't many lights and the lights are yellow so it's a bit dark. The area is large so the windows are very cool and windy.
The toilet is okay, using dark tone tiles + few lights so the toilet is dark, the toiletries have a lot of calcium residue, at first glance it's clean but if you look closely, it's not very clean. Need to improve cleaning the toilet as well as change the lights a little brighter, that would be great. There is a buffet breakfast but I didn't eat it so I don't know how it tastes, but the restaurant prepares very fragrant food.
The location is about 15-20 minutes drive from the center of Vung Tau, so you should have a car or private car to pick you up. In return, this area is quiet. Although there are a few villas for rent that sing in the evening, they are not too noisy, just enough to rest.

Only 150m from the public beach (2-minute walk)
- Campus of more than 3000m2 with cool green coconut trees
- Outdoor swimming pool of 180m2 (with children's pool)
- All rooms have airy balconies.
- Spacious and comfortable parking
- Large yard for parties (BBQ, Birthday, Gala, Year-end party ...)
- Indoor restaurant with capacity of 120 guests
- Room rates from 600K including breakfast and swimming pool use
- Suitable for family vacations

- Cute small hotel combined with Tea and Coffee shop (Quality drinks at reasonable prices). - Opposite the sea and public beach (30m)

- Sea view from the terrace at sunset is very beautiful. - Modern and dynamic design, an ideal place for young people to check in

The hotel is very beautiful, beautiful inside and out, the staff is cheerful, the swimming pool has umbrellas so it's less sunny, the breakfast buffet is delicious, in general there's nothing to complain about except the road to the hotel is under construction so it's a bit ugly.

Attentive service, very professional staff. I only had the opportunity to interact with the receptionist and the security guard. Thank you very much for the enthusiasm and thoughtfulness of the staff here. This is a place I will definitely come back to relax.
Nice clean room, delicious food, friendly staff. Been there many times
My family had a great experience here.

New room, clean. The reception desk did not turn on the air conditioner, it was quite hot for guests checking in at noon in August. The location is near Long Cung beach, but the beach location has many domestic water discharge pipes, 6-7km from the center of Vung Tau, close to Chi Linh kdc and sealink, dic phoenix so it is ok to eat and drink.

The price is excellent, the room was clean and spacious, with a balcony, and the breakfast was delicious. The hotel has its own small swimming pool, and the beach is only a 5-minute walk away. However, it is a little far from the bustling city center, so walking would be a bit tiring. Renting a scooter would be a good option for getting around.

A bit far from the center, but the room is very ok, the service is very ok, friendly and enthusiastic, easy to consult, the buffet has enough dishes, breakfast is also enough but the taste is not really to my taste. Comfortable car park, clean swimming pool, enthusiastic pool staff, I asked to rent swimming goggles and he lent me for free. The security guard who watches the car day and night is also cute, the elevator is ok, the restroom is clean, new, and beautiful. Will come back if I have the chance.

Room quality ðŸ‘ is good. Minimalist style, gray is the main color so it feels comfortable when entering the room!
The staff is also cute!
Just try to improve housekeeping so that hidden details like behind the sink and toilet are cleaner!
There is a car park.
Sunset ðŸŒ… from balcony 10/10

I booked a sup room, but was upgraded to a super room, with a pool view, a larger and more beautiful room. Supported by the sup room price. The room is clean, far from the city, quiet, suitable for relaxation near the beach. A great experience

The first time I experienced HAFI on a weekday, there weren't many guests, only 1 or 2 families, but I liked the feeling, isolated and quiet, I really liked the swimming pool (so big) and the enthusiastic staff here. This is a real compliment, not seeding. But it's a bit far from the city, if you don't want to go far, book a room in Ha Long near the front and back beaches.

Clean room, enthusiastic and attentive staff. I really like staying here, it feels very comfortable like at home. Although I don't check in until 2am, I arrived a bit early and was still supported to check in early without any extra charge, I love it. Now, if you become a loyal customer and book a room, you will get an additional discount. 10 VND
Spacious, clean room, reasonable price. Receptionist is enthusiastic and quick. Can book room via app so convenient.
Nice, spacious and clean room. Attentive and enthusiastic staff. Great view but reasonable price.
Nice location. The view is quite good, the rooms are clean and airy. Enthusiastic staff and reasonable prices

Great hotel, reasonable price
- Large swimming pool, clean beach, not too crowded
-Most impressive is the breakfast buffet, delicious and many dishes
- Spacious rooms, with balcony
The distance from the center is about 5km. Does not affect entertainment in the center ^^

Near the beach but the room is not very good, the staff is friendly and cute, the pool security guard seems a bit impolite, but not to me, I saw him reminding the other female guest and shouting a bit loudly, I thought I should go closer to remind her, the shouting startled me, I don't know if he had any bad intentions or not.

I was really impressed and extremely happy because I met the friendly Vung Tau people and the hotel was absolutely perfect for my ideas. Everything was great, from the receptionist to my room being upgraded, I was able to check in early on weekdays around 11am, the staff were very nice. If I have the opportunity to go to VT again, I will definitely choose Hafi hotel as my resort.
Great, comfortable. The owner is funny and friendly.
Clean room, enthusiastic and attentive staff. Really like staying here, feels very comfortable like at home. Will come back when I have the chance.

The hotel is very ok, the security guard is enthusiastic, the receptionists are very friendly and cheerful, I asked to find anything, they helped me, the hotel is near the beach, walk 200m to watch the sunrise, very beautiful, at night you can walk to the beach, there is a parking lot for cars, there is a swimming pool, in general very satisfied, a little far from the center, otherwise perfect
Beautiful hotel, attentive service, super nice view, 10 stars
Everyone, the hotel is clean. Near the beach. Recommended to stay.

I accidentally chose HAFI and when I entered the room, I really liked it. The room was simple but beautiful, especially clean, the toilet was also clean, the exhaust fan was good so it was not damp and had no smell. I accidentally broke the ceramic shampoo bottle but HAFI did not charge extra. The service was very good. If you need anything, just call and it will be available immediately. The swimming pool was also extremely clean, there were also some inflatable toys which were fun. The breakfast buffet had few dishes but was delicious, with lots of fruit. In general, 100 VND, next time I go to VT, I will come to HAFI again.

Luxury, clean, new hotel
The location is a bit far from the center but in return it is very quiet and comfortable.
The staff is cheerful and enthusiastic, especially the security guard is very friendly.
The hotel pillows are made from high-quality cotton, very soft.
The food at the hotel is especially delicious.
The swimming pool is large, clean, and safe

I just had one stay here. I didn't plan to book too far from the center, but when I came here to experience it, everything was very thoughtful compared to the price.
1) About price: the price is quite good compared to the central price of 600k/room or more (weekly price).
-I booked 2 rooms at Tet price:
Room P306- 2 â€‹â€‹beds 1 million
Room 201- 1 bed 1 million
-All rooms have large balconies.
The above price includes discount, early booking with breakfast buffet + 1 additional baby (about 200k/night)
2) The location is quite quiet, the view is not directly facing the sea but the view is quite good, 200m down to the sea, next to Long Cung resort and The Aria resort Vung Tau. This area is full of villas so it is not as crowded as the front beach, suitable for those who like quiet.
But the bend from the main road to the hotel has no traffic lights, so you have to be careful when crossing
3) Good facilities, all made of wood, new rooms, clean, but the wait for hot water is a bit long, probably due to the use of solar energy, hidden ceiling air conditioners for all rooms, 60 inch TV, sofa, large toilet, swimming pool behind the hotel, clean. Around the house is well kept, no trash thrown around
And note that when you check in, check all the equipment from hot water, air conditioning, toilet sensor lights, umbrellas, TV remotes, etc.... everything is still enough and working well. If there is any problem, report it to the receptionist immediately because everything is regulated into money. If lost or damaged, compensation will be made according to the hotel's rules, which is easy to understand.
4) Service: I highly appreciate the service here is very good, the staff from the receptionist to the staff members are all warm, polite and pleasant. Everything responds very quickly.
5) The breakfast buffet doesn't have many dishes, but the kitchen makes it very suitable for your taste.
Family meals are very delicious, a set of rice for 2 adults + 1 child costs about 200k-300k (not including the 20% Tet surcharge and VAT, but I find the price still more reasonable than eating out in terms of quality and price.
Or eat alacarte as you like for 50k-180k/dish
Coffee: 20k-30k
Beer is the same price outside, sometimes cheaper
I think the price of seafood here is also good because I went down to Long Son floating raft to eat crabs for about 880k/kg, size 5 is also expensive and Thanh Phat Seafood is also somewhere the same price as Hafi, Hafi is 1 million/kg but size 2-3 so that price is also ok.
In short, in my opinion, if you rent a room near the center and have breakfast on your own, I think this place has a pretty good cost for 1 night, not too expensive, with good amenities and services that are worth choosing for your own vacation and your family.
I evaluate objectively according to my feelings.
Thank you Hafi and I hope you always maintain such quality.

Great stay at Hafi Hotel VÅ©ng TÃ u!

I had a really pleasant experience here. The hotel is clean, modern, and very comfortable. The location is super convenient â€” just a short walk to the beach and close to many local food places and cafÃ©s. The staff were friendly and helpful throughout my stay.

The price was also very reasonable for what you get â€” great value compared to many other hotels in the area. The pool area was nice and relaxing, and the room had everything I needed. I would definitely recommend Hafi Hotel to anyone visiting VÅ©ng TÃ u, and Iâ€™ll be happy to come back again! ðŸŒ´

This hotel is just a 5-minute walk to the beach and offers reasonable prices. The rooms are clean, and although the staff donâ€™t speak English, they are very friendly and welcoming.

However, the hotel restaurant was quite disappointing â€” the food was poorly prepared, and unfortunately, there are no other dining options nearby. We had to take a taxi into the city for every meal, which became quite inconvenient.

Tip for future guests: If you plan to stay here, consider bringing some food with you or arranging transport in advance for meals, as there are very limited options in the area.

I randomly selected this hotel after an stress-filled day of traveling by motorbike.  I was in serious need of rest, and this hotel was the one nearest me.

The reception staff were kind and efficient at check-in.  My room was spacious and clean.  I spent two relaxing nights before  continuing on my cross-country travel (although I was tempted to stay a third: the bed was like resting on a cloud).  The water pressure and temp was excellent and I especially enjoyed the balcony access.

This hotel is new and the area surrounding it was in development during my stay.  Beach access is within walking distance (less than a 5 minute walk) and their onsite dining facilities provide a decent number of dishes from which to choose.

One note of mention - there was a moment of confusion during my stay.  The subject of the confusion is not significant, but what is significant is how the staff handled the matter.  Each staff member took time to listen and offer support within their capability.  Ultimately, the situation was resolved, and the staff were quite gracious in accepting responsibility in the situation.  They even discounted my second night's stay to apologize for the misunderstanding.  I am very appreciative of their approach to customer service and business management.

I will choose this hotel again the next time I travel to Vung Tau.

Full 5*! Had such a great breakfast here with noodle soup, tofu and seaweed soup, and Viet fresh spring rolls. The ambiance is fine, but not the focus, so I gave it a 5* as well just because there should not be a distraction from this great food!
Thank you also for the great service, very fast and kind staff!

Located beside a tranquil pond, CHAY TÃ‚M Tá»ª offers a peaceful and refreshing dining experience for vegetarians and health-conscious travellers. The menu is simple, precise, and thoughtfully curated, showcasing fresh, wholesome ingredients at very reasonable prices. Whether youâ€™re seeking a quiet meal or a scenic spot to unwind, this hidden gem provides excellent value and a serene atmosphere that aligns perfectly with mindful travel.

IV Holidays highly recommends CHAY TÃ‚M Tá»ª as a must-visit for those looking to enjoy authentic vegetarian cuisine in a calming, natural setting.
Quiet atmosphere, simple menu, cheap prices and good food. Only downside is the work being done out the front as it smells. But once inside you canâ€™t smell it.

A very good and well priced vegan restaurant. One thing that you wanna be aware of before coming in is the smell of the pond/lake right next to this place, which is pretty bad and you can still smell it while eating at this place, so if you are smell sensitive, you probably wanna avoid here. As for the food, I liked the braised mushrooms especially.

A great restaurant tucked away just off a main road. The owners used to run a restaurant in HCMC, and it shows in the level of quality, which is clearly a cut above the average in Vung Tau.

We had the fresh springrolls, rice vermicelli soup, lemongrass chili tofu and the delightful lime and mushroom salad, which was probably my favorite.

I recommend anyone, vegetarian, vegan or otherwise to give this place a try!

I used Grab delivery several times for veggie food from this place while staying in Vung Tau. Very decent portions, tasty and delicious food. I recommend raw veggie spring rolls ðŸ’š Was pleased to try out mushrooms served along with most of the dishes. Thank you ðŸ™ðŸ» Com on ðŸ«¶

I ordered tofu with mushrooms and broccoli with oyster sauce. The food was good, but the portions were really small. I guess for the price, thatâ€™s expected. The rice was a bit hard, probably because it was left in the rice cooker too long. Overall, it wasnâ€™t anything special.

The phnom penh noodle soup was the most delicious vegetarian noodle i ever had. My partner order the "my duc soya noodle stir fry was also nice accompanied by the chilli oil. The lemongrass chilli tofu was soft n crispy on the outside. Great service staff and the ambiance was great. The food is great and affordable. 6:30am to 8pm.
Very nice experience - the food was fantastic, the braised tofu with mushroom was my favorite. I ate so fast and forgot to take photos ðŸ¥² Beautiful view looking out from the restaurant too.
Delicious food and very reasonable prices - I will visit again soon!

If you're living in the Melody apartment area and craving vegetarian food, this restaurant is a must-try. I recently discovered it during a rainy day and was pleasantly surprised.

I ordered the bun bo chay and it was absolutely delicious. Unfortunately, I was so eager to enjoy it that I forgot to take a photo before finishing. The prices are also very reasonable, making it a great option for a satisfying vegetarian meal. Highly recommended!

A real vegetarian and vegan gem in Vung Tau. (The only non-vegan thing i could see on the menu was yoghurt.) The food is delicious and the menu is wide-ranging. The staff are really lovely. The prices are extremely low and there's free green tea with ginger. I ate here every day during my stay in Vung Tau. Highly recommended.

A nice simple vegetarian chay restaurant. The food was super tasty and very well priced. Under $3AUD or 45,000VND

A little hidden off the Main Street but a well lit sign allows you to find it easily!

Will be back. Thank you.
A nice little place tucked down a wide road by the lake. Food was delicious and well priced. Tony, the owner speaks English and is very friendly. I will definitely return.

Wow!
Eat here, it's really delicious.
Close your eyes and pick anything. Each dish has its own unique flavors, and they're all good.
The tight menu is packed with goodies.
Unbelievable prices.
Shopee orders are okay.

I really enjoyed dining here. It's a family restaurant run with passion and a smile.

It's only open weekdays and they rent out the space for home stays on the weekends.

The owners are generous and helpful. They helped us search (and successfully located) a vegetarian street food in town.

This restaurant is just getting started. They ran a successful spot in HCMC, but returned home to be closer to extended family.

The spot is located just a short distance from a main Street along a lake. It's quiet there.

Nicely decorated restaurant with good food and friendly owners;)  I had a great chat with the owner  about buddhism;) the restaurant is located in a quiet area next to the  lake. So you can relax and enjoy your food;)
We shared hotpot and summer rolls. The hotpot was plenty for 2 people. The chili oil was amazing. The service was lovely. We would definitely come back.

I'm not vegetarian nor vegan, and I generally stay away from this kind of places in my own country, because they often offer blander tastes for higher prices. But traveling throughout Vietnam has thought me that this isn't true everywhere. This place is a perfect example of a vegetarian gem, where everything taste amazing, the service is kind, the ambience nice and the prices very reasonable. Definitely a place to try in VÅ©ng TÃ u.
If you are vegan , Vegetarian and coming in Vung Tau please come this restaurant delicious tastes of Vietnamese Vegetarian Foods
Clean ,yummy vegetarian food with multiple options and reasonable price

CÃ´ Æ¡i was sweet and kind

Very nice place with lots of veggie options. The food was really good, I highly recommend!
Very generous portion. My Duc rice with mushrooms is highly recommended!

My family and I stopped here for a quick bite to eat on our travels through and it was absolutely delicious! The staff were friendly and efficient and our food came out in no time at all. We had several dishes, all of which were fresh and totally scrumptious. A stop here is a must â˜ºï¸
Best food in Vung Tau by far, beautiful cheap bowls of noodles and rice, run by a local family. Definitely worth going if youâ€™re a vegan in Vung Tau
What a great find just off the main road in a quiet location. The food is fresh, flavoursome and simply delicious and at a great price.
We recommend this vegan restaurant in Vung Tau. It is located on the south of the lake away from the noisy streets, this is very pleasant. And you can eat good vegan food at a good price.
We have visited twice before returning to London. The fresh, homemade vegetable dishes are full of flavour and great value. The restaurant is run by a friendly hardworking family.

Wow! Incredible tasting vegan food at seriously cheap prices! (And thatâ€™s coming from someone that loves their meat!) We had the mushroom & lime salad, chilli tofu, fresh spring rolls and braised king mushroom. All were amazing and some of the tastiest food weâ€™ve had in the 3 months weâ€™ve been in Vietnam. A must try ðŸ‘ðŸ¼
Highly recommended! Very tasty food and nice, polite owners.

We discovered this little place before arriving here and we definitely wanted to visit.
Upon our arrival, it exceeded our expectations!
We ordered the chilli tofu which was not spicy but perfect. Also ordered the fresh spring rolls which were my perfect ðŸ‘Œ

Clean, healthy home-made food! Small family run facility.
Support the local community without breaking the budget.

This was the best meal we had in Vung Tau! Fresh veggies, delicious sauces, and the friendliest family running it. It was so good we are going back tomorrow for lunch. We had the spring rolls, the mushroom lime salad, the pho, and the chili lemongrass tofu. Each dish was amazing!
The food here is delicious, the owners are very nice, and the atmosphere of the restaurant is great.
Good family restaurant with yummy food.

I traveled north to south of Vietnam. This is the only restaurant that cooked soup with fermented soybean flavor which I do at home. ðŸ˜‹
Although soup lack of some spices I use at home but it is unique.
The staff is very friendly, not like many places just drop off the meal and disappeared.
Very relaxing and clean place.
I had tofu with veggies and rice with mushroom. Very good food and only cost 65 vdn! Calm and nice atmosphere, nice owners, and food came very fast. English menu. No seating outside.

What a great find! And with a little view to the lake too! Great and friendly service, great ambience, and fantastic food at a great price! Strictly vegi here, so no worries of cross contamination. Five stars across the board here, don't miss it!
The food was so good. They have great vegan options. Itâ€™s a beautiful place to eat and everybody is so welcoming. I really loved the whole experience!

This is very good vegetarian restaurante that I came many times during my stay in Vung Tau. The food is delicious and at a very reasonable price. It's run by a family and everyone was super nice and friendly!
Just a great place. It is a mistake not to go. The food was really fresh and delicious and the owner was really kind and interested in the guest visiting the restaurant. We will go again!

Really nice guy that owns the place, told us good places to go on our way up north. Food was really good and well portioned and all around 35-40k dong. Definitely recommend and I will be back if ever in the area again

Good vegetarian restaurant.
Not too often do I eat vegetarian  but I needed a change for tonight's dinner. I was not disappointed.  Good food , good value and the owners are very nice .

Really fantasticand delicious vegetarian food. Especially the sauce with the spring rolls.

Great customer service too. Highly recommend this play to all those vegetarian and non vegetarian.
Excellent food and amazing service! Fresh and very tasty dishes! The spring rolls are a must! We will come back again.
The food was good and served quickly, with big portions. The owner and his daughter (?) were very friendly. Also the location is very nice and easy to reach
This restaurant is amazing. Great options of vegetarian food, great service, very friendly owner and very fair prices. Would definitely come here again
Good food, kind service, nice lake view and lovely decorations. The prices are not expensive. We would go back here again.
Lovely food, super clean and very good prices. You should visit this family run vegetarian  restaurant  if you are in Vung Tau.
Food was incredible, honestly one of the best meals I've eaten in Vietnam! The owners are very friendly and welcoming.
Such a great place! Amazing tasting vegetarian food! Great prices too. Trust me you wonâ€™t be disappointed.
Delicious food. QUIET! English speaking. Perfect service.
Great food, very delicious! Amazing service as well, and very good value for money! We will be back :)

Very good vegetarian food. Must visit if you are looking for fresh vegetarian food.

The food was delicious! I had a braised eggplant that was soooooo tasty and flavorful! I would totally recommend this food!

Very good veggie food, super friendly service. Thank you!
Wonderful service and food. Well priced and tasty.

1. Space & location
â€¢ The restaurant is located at 119/3 Hoang Hoa Tham, near the center, easy to find.
â€¢ Simple space, traditional wooden tables and chairs, airy
â€¢ Air conditioning and fan.
â€¢ Suitable for quick, compact meals.

2. Menu & dishes
â€¢ Diverse: from rice, vermicelli, noodles, hot pot to braised, stir-fried, salad dishes. Reasonable price (30k - 50k for main dishes, hot pot from 180k).
â€¢ Dishes tried:
â€¢ Shredded mushroom rice: sticky rice, seasoned well, served with oyster mushrooms, vegetables and fried tofu.
â€¢ Tam Tu mixed rice: fuller, with many toppings such as mushrooms, vegetables, tofu, adding roasted sesame to create a rich flavor.
â€¢ Perilla leaf juice / fruit juice: natural color, refreshing, good heat relief.
â€¢ Advantages: The dishes are well-seasoned, not too sweet or greasy â€“ true to the spirit of â€œhealthy vegetarianismâ€.

3. Service & experience
â€¢ Bilingual menu in Vietnamese and English: easy to access for tourists.

â€¢ Friendly staff, fast service.
â€¢ QR code for customers to rate Google Maps â€“ shows that the restaurant focuses on customer experience.

4. Strengths â€“ points to improve
â€¢ Strengths:
â€¢ Cheap â€“ affordable.
â€¢ Diverse dishes, suitable for many tastes.
â€¢ Suitable for working people, tourists who want a light vegetarian meal.

The restaurant is located in an alley but the road is very wide, parking for cars and 45-seat vehicles is comfortable. The vegetarian dishes of the restaurant are very delicious. Especially the mixed rice dish.
If I have the opportunity to go to Vung Tau, I will continue to support the restaurant.

The restaurant sells delicious vegetarian dishes
Reasonable prices
Airy and clean space
The owner is very cheerful and friendly.
If I have the opportunity to visit Vung Tau, I will visit and support the restaurant.

The restaurant is located in a very poetic location, far from the noise of traffic, a large alley that cars can enter, overlooking the lotus pond. I really like the banana flower salad and mixed rice. Delicious, affordable price. Thank you restaurant
The dishes are all delicious, light in flavor, and you can eat them forever without getting bored. The service is very enthusiastic and attentive.
Found a vegetarian restaurant that is both delicious and cheap. Extremely high quality. Will come back many times in the future.

The vegetarian restaurant inside is not on the front of Hoang Hoa Tham street, but in return, it has a view of the lake and air-conditioned space. 
There is a 16-seat parking lot outside. The first time I ate there, I was surprised because the price of the food was reasonable but the quality was beyond my expectations. There was also free iced tea. 
Hot pot is about 200K. I will come back when I go to Vung Tau.
You should visit everyone. I ordered bamboo shoot vermicelli, it suits my taste, the menu has many dishes. 10 points compared to 2 other vegetarian restaurants I ate at in VT
I found it delicious, everyone should try it. I found the sausage delicious so I bought some more to eat at home. The service was very good, the girls were very cheerful and enthusiastic.
Delicious food, soft rice grains, fragrant mushrooms, crispy fried ribs, hot soup, rich flavor, gentle and cute owner, everyone come eat and support the restaurant.
Super delicious, fast food, enthusiastic staff, highly recommended

Family vegetarian restaurant, located in a modest location in an alley.

The food is normal, not too special. Quite clean. The menu is not very diverse. The spring rolls are not delicious, the sauce is strange and not suitable.

The restaurant space is also simple, few tables. Cheap and popular with many foreigners.
I ate 1 mixed rice and a bowl of jute mallow soup, delicious, clean, and the staff was friendly too.

The vegetarian restaurant is located by the lake, air-conditioned. There is a 16-car parking space outside. The first time I ate there, I was surprised because the price of the food was only 35-40K but the quality was beyond my expectations. There was also free iced tea. Hot pot was around 200K. If I have a chance to go to Vung Tau, I will come back.

My wife and I are both vegetarians.

We have eaten at many restaurants, but when we come here, the feeling is really new...
The food is very delicious, not too bland, not too strong..... sweet taste, suitable for vegetarians to enjoy and experience â¤â¤â¤â¤

The food is so delicious that I forget to take pictures every time I come. Natural vegetarian food, delicious broth. The owners are friendly and cute. The restaurant is right in the center, the decoration is chill
Every time I go to VT, I stop by to eat, in general, I love it and the price is reasonable
The dry noodles are delicious! I haven't tried the other dishes yet, but I'll come back when I have the chance!

The restaurant is in a large alley, opposite a lake which is quite cool in the afternoon. Reasonable price for a tourist area, delicious food, clean, polite and quiet, the owner asks and understands the customers' wishes well.
Delicious, light food with lots of toppings. This will be my vegetarian place every time I come to Vung Tau.
Cute and small restaurant, the owner is cute and enthusiastic. The food is delicious, the price is very reasonable. You should try it.
My family is always loyal to Chinese spinach soup, braised tofu with mushrooms, stir-fried morning glory with garlic, and banana flower salad. Every dish is delicious.

Very delicious vegan and vegetarian dishes. We went there with our two children and received a very warm welcome. We had six different dishes, all of which were delicious. Our total bill was 250,000 dong, which was an absolutely reasonable price for the amount.
The restaurant is somewhat tucked away on a side street, so it's pleasantly quiet.
This is my first time here, the food is delicious. The dish I had was mixed rice. The owner is cute, the restaurant is clean and quiet.

Delicious restaurant, comfortable and cool space
The price is also very reasonable, delicious, quality
I really like this restaurant

Delicious rice. Friendly and cheerful owner.

The price is only around 40-50 VND for each dish. The owners are gentle and cute. If there is a chance, I will come back. I recommend everyone to experience it.
Reasonable price, friendly owner and staff. The restaurant is crowded but still tries to serve dishes on time so as not to upset customers.

Although it was my first time at the restaurant, the owner was very cute and enthusiastic. The food was delicious, diverse, and beautifully decorated. I think this will be a great place for everyone to come and experience vegetarian dishes! Address of the restaurant: 119/3 Hoang Hoa Tham, Ward Thang Tam, Vung Tau City.

The waiters were indifferent, they had to clean the table 3 or 4 times before they cleared it but it was still very dirty. The restaurant was crowded so I tried to sit and wait patiently but other tables that came in later still got their food first, when I told the staff they were still indifferent. Overall, an extremely bad experience.
The restaurant space is airy and cozy, the food is super delicious, the price is super reasonable. I will visit the restaurant again next time.
The vegetarian restaurant is very delicious, with a variety of dishes to choose from. If I have the chance, I will visit again.

Full 5*! Had such a great breakfast here with noodle soup, tofu and seaweed soup, and Viet fresh spring rolls. The ambiance is fine, but not the focus, so I gave it a 5* as well just because there should not be a distraction from this great food!
Thank you also for the great service, very fast and kind staff!
